嗯……你找我所为何事？=Well ...... what do you want to see me about?
我年幼时误食用一枚蓝色的灵芝，平白获得了1000年的寿元，但是每过一百年便会沉睡一次，并且会在百年之后醒来……呵呵，别看我长相不老，实则却已经活了上千年之久……=I was young when I mistakenly used a blue lingzhi, for nothing to get 1000 years of life, but every 100 years will sleep once, and will wake up after a hundred years ...... Oh, don't look at me look not old, but in fact has lived for thousands of years ......
（啧啧称奇）真是大千世界，无奇不有……不过这么说来……你经历过当年的那场人族与妖族的战争？=(tsk tsk) really a big world, there is nothing strange ...... but so ...... you experienced that war between the human race and the demon race back then?
（长叹）不错，那个时候跟我同辈的亲人好友都相继离世，待到第一次沉睡苏醒的时候，我感到这个世界无比陌生。我不禁问自己生存的意义在哪里，我有了这样的奇遇，是不是应该做些什么？=(Long sigh) Good, at that time, my family and friends of the same generation passed away one after another, and when I woke up from my first sleep, I felt that the world was strange. I couldn't help but ask myself what the meaning of existence was, and if I should do something after having such a strange encounter.
还没等我想明白，战争就开始了……当时的文字形状复杂，晦涩难懂，掌握的人很少。而想要修炼就必须识得这些文字，加之本来就不是人人都有修炼的资质，故人族中的修炼者数量非常稀少……=Before I can think about it, the war began ...... then the shape of the text is complex, obscure and difficult to understand, mastering few people. And want to cultivate must know these words, plus not everyone originally has the qualification to cultivate, so the number of practitioners in the human race is very rare ......
这就导致了人族在在战争最开始的时候，战事非常不顺……=This led to the human race in the very beginning of the war, the war was very unpleasant ......
嗯？现在只要肯下功夫，几乎人人都可以学习文字……那这么说来，我们现在的文字是后来才有的吗？=Hmm? Nowadays, almost everyone can learn the written word if they are willing to put in the effort ...... So, in that case, did we get the written word now later?
不错，正是我修改了古代修士们的文字，让它们更加浅显易懂，就连凡人也能熟练掌握……随着人族修士的增多，战争的形势也渐渐逆转了。=Good, it was I who modified the words of the ancient monks, making them more plain and easy to understand, so that even mortals could master them ...... （痛苦）哎……见过那样的战场，也许你就不会有这种想法了……曾经一座座繁华的聚落变成废墟，郁郁葱葱的森林化为焦土，干净清澈的河水漂浮着尸体和鲜血……=(Pain) Hey ...... seen a battlefield like that, maybe you won't have such thoughts ...... once a prosperous settlement turned into ruins, lush forests turned into scorched earth, clean and clear rivers floating with corpses and blood ......

在海之角深处，一处地下宫殿处，无数灵炁倒灌而来，一煞气逼人的年轻妖族悬浮在半空中，而他身后是一到由于天地法则凝成的大门虚影，大门处有无数碧蓝铭文用处，交织成柱冲向天际。=In the depths of the Cape of the sea, an underground palace, countless spiritual air pouring in, a fierce young demon suspended in mid-air, and behind him is a to due to the laws of heaven and earth condensed into the gate shadow, the gate has countless turquoise blue inscriptions used, interwoven into a column rushing toward the sky.
那是……「天地大符」，「水眼」封印……=That is ...... "Heaven and Earth Great Symbol", "Water Eye" seal ......
哈哈哈哈！只需要再过半个时辰……这「水眼」便能完全洞开……届时，就是新世界的伊始！=Hahahahahaha! Only half an hour more ...... this "water eye" will be completely open ...... then, is the beginning of a new world!
你究竟想干什么？！如果这世界一切生灵都将毁灭？那新世界还有什么意义？=What the hell do you want? If all the living beings in this world will be destroyed? Then what is the point of the new world?
意义？正是因为愚昧、混沌的旧世界总是重复同样的错误，所以才会造成种种的灾祸！只有活下来的人才有资格迎来新世界！这就是意义！=Meaning? It is because the foolish, chaotic old world always repeats the same mistakes that cause all kinds of calamities! Only those who survive are qualified to usher in the new world! That is the meaning!
谁允许你定义混沌与愚昧？！那些拼命生存的人，难道在你眼中也是愚昧？=Who allowed you to define chaos and ignorance? Are those who are desperately trying to survive also foolish in your eyes?
煞气逼人的年轻男子悬浮在空中，放生狂笑，张开双臂，似乎梦想的新世界就要到来。风在狂舞，虚幻之门引起的崩坏法则带来直欲撕碎耳膜、直击灵魂的狂躁之音——=The fierce young man hovered in the air, laughing wildly, opening his arms, as if the new world of his dreams was about to come. The wind is dancing wildly, the collapse of the law caused by the illusory door brings a manic sound that wants to tear the eardrums and hit the soul -
不错！有多少生灵只是混沌地活着，他们依靠本能，凭借直觉，颂扬软弱的善良，到头来不过是为虎作伥的帮凶——只有潜入最深邃的黑暗才有可能诞生真正的光明！=Yes! How many beings live only chaotically, relying on instinct, on intuition, celebrating weak goodness, and in the end being nothing more than accomplices to the tiger - only by diving into the deepest darkness is it possible to give birth to true light!
我一定会阻止你的=I will stop you.
哼……哈哈哈哈，如果你做得到的话，那就尽管来试试吧！=Hum ...... hahahahaha, if you can do it, then by all means come and try!

In the meadows, in the puddles, in the mountains -

（激动）什么？您说什么？！请您指一条明路！=(Excited) What? What did you say? Please show me the way!

（焦急）不过什么？=(anxious) But what?
（皱眉）不过以我对你们的了解，仅凭你们夏后氏族的人数还远远不够……更别说你们在这次大水中本就损失惨重……=(Frowning) But with what I know about you, the number of your Xia Hou clan alone is far from enough ...... not to mention the heavy losses you had in this great flood ......
（坚定）不！够了，已经够了！因为我们从来不是一个人……或者一群人，夏后氏族……很大，有些人尽管远离了氏族，走到了太初世界的各个角落，但是我们的心都是连在一起的！=(firmly) No! Enough is enough! 我们……仍有希望！=There is still hope for us at ......!
曾经放弃过希望的夏禹从这一刻起，已经看不到半点稚气，脸上只有坚定。他昭告天下，团结一切有志之士，在奋力抗争数年之后，终于把大水治服，这份坚韧与恒心让无数人动容，后世皆称其为——=From this moment on, Xia Yu, who had once given up hope, could no longer see any trace of boyishness, but only determination on his face. He announced to the world that he would unite all those who had the will to fight for several years before finally curing the great waters.

见过掌门师尊！我苦修数年，走了不少弯路，一直苦于没有人指点。今，今日终于得遇良师……呜。=Greetings, Master! I have been cultivating hard for several years and have taken many detours, but I have been suffering from the lack of guidance. Today, today I have finally met a good teacher ...... who.
免礼，既入我门，那么今后你就当勤修不辍，弘我门威。不过……=Free salute, since you have entered my discipline, then in the future you should diligently cultivate, to promote the power of my discipline. But ......
如今已有趁手的法宝，也学会了制符，如此一来，就算出门游历也有可以自保的手段……不过从长期考虑的话，如果没有匹配的功法，那么修行就像水中捞月……=Now there is a handy magic treasure, also learned to make talisman, so that even if you go out to travel there can be a means of self-protection ...... However, from a long-term consideration, if there is no matching gongfa, then cultivation is like fishing for the moon in the water ......
本派如今人才凋敝，然弟子乃门派之本。所以在传授你功法之前，我决定把你提拔进内门，成为一名内门弟子，也以此希望你能勤修不辍，将门派之名发扬光大。=Our school is now depleted of talents, but disciples are the foundation of the school. So before I teach you kung fu, I decided to promote you into the inner sect, become an inner disciple, but also in this way hope that you can diligently cultivate, the sect's name to carry forward.

迷失森林1-进入森林=Lost Forest 1 - Enter the forest
片刻思考后，你决定进入森林探查一番，说不定就能捡到遗失的宝物。在林中，无数挺拔的树木联合茂密的树枝遮蔽了天空，你在树林间前行时在路的一侧发现了非人的脚印，一直延伸至森林的深处=After a moment's reflection, you decide to enter the forest to explore a little, maybe you can pick up the lost treasures. In the forest, countless tall trees unite with dense branches to hide the sky, and you find inhuman footprints on the side of the road as you walk among the trees, stretching deep into the forest

迷失森林1-跟随脚印=Lost Forest 1-Follow the footprints
你跟着脚印前行，不久之后来到了一颗灵树之下，树下坐着一具枯骨，枯骨一旁插着一把散发着强大气息的法宝=You follow the footprints forward, shortly after arriving under a spiritual tree, under the tree sits a dead bone, dead bone next to insert a magic treasure emitting a powerful aura

迷失森林1-沿着道路=Lost Forest 1 - Along the road

承神皇之佑；\n十都东皇天帝君；\n五方远古之神树；\n血契立行；\n神皇允曰，\n凡神族之盛，可与其民同行；\n凡神族之血，惟以敌首祭祀；\n凡神族之祸，虽百死不可避；\n凡神族之衰，必护零落之嗣。\n神树允曰，\n吾之枝桠，为杀敌之剑；\n吾之身躯，为御敌之盾；\n吾之精血，为守护挥洒；\n吾之信念，千万载不变；\n立此血契者，后万万之世不可更改。=The God Emperor's blessing; \n the ten Eastern Heavenly Emperors; \n the five ancient gods of the tree; \n the blood covenant to establish the line; \n the God Emperor promised that, \n where the gods of the tribe's prosperity, can walk with its people; \n where the blood of the gods, but the head of the enemy sacrifice; \n where the scourge of the gods, although a hundred deaths can not be avoided; \n where the gods of the tribe's decline, will protect the fallen heir. \nThe divine tree promised, \nmy branches, for the killing sword; \nmy body, for the shield against the enemy; \nmy blood, for the protection of the splash; \nmy beliefs, millions of years unchanged; \nThe establishment of this blood contract, after ten thousand years of life can not be changed.
《焚邪》\n太初元年前414年，众人聚邪功以焚烧。\n无数的精妙功法在此次浩劫中毁于一旦。\n邪义其邪？\n刀斧可以劈砍柴薪，亦可以劈伤人畜。\n人往往容易被邪恶的表象迷惑，而忘却了人心的失控才是一切的源头。=The Burning of the Evil \n 414 years before the first year of Tai Chu, the people gathered evil gong to burn. \nNumerous exquisite gong methods were destroyed in this catastrophe. \n evil meaning its evil? \n Knives and axes can chop wood and firewood, and they can also chop and hurt people and animals. \nPeople are often easily confused by the appearance of evil, and forget that the out-of-control hearts are the source of everything.
呵呵呵，\n那棵愚不可耐的大树，\n还沉浸在梦境之中，\n与虚假的敌人战斗，\n殊不知早已成为他人的养分\n所有误入林中的人都将成为我的食物，\n呵呵呵，这旺盛的血气，\n令我愉悦。=Ohhhh, \n that big, foolish tree, \n still immersed in a dream, \n fighting with a false enemy, \n unaware that it has long been the sustenance of others \n all those who stray into the forest will become my food, \n the exuberant blood, \n delighting me.
潭中曾有二蛟，一公一母，常到附近聚落兴风作浪，鼓荡妖气吸食活人，为祸一方。\n蛇雉遗卵于地，千年而生蛟龙属；\n虺五百年为蛟，蛟千年为龙，龙五百年为角龙，千年为应龙；\n邪功之法，无不垂涎蛟龙精血以增强自身血气；正功之法，可以蛟珠入丹，亦妙用无穷。\n太初元年前366年，正邪两派修士围攻二蛟，公蛟力竭倒下，\n正逢母蛟产子，遂陷入疯狂，众人不敌，故合力将二蛟封印于此地，\n生人勿进。=There were two augers in the pool, a male and a female, often to the nearby settlements to make waves, agitating the demon gas sucking the living, for a disaster. \n snake and pheasant left eggs in the ground, a thousand years and the birth of a dragon; \n vicious five hundred years for the dragon, a thousand years for the dragon, dragon five hundred years for the horned dragon, a thousand years for the dragon; \n evil gong method, all coveting the essence of the dragon's blood to enhance their own blood; positive gong method, can be a pearl into the Dan, but also wonderful use endless. \n 366 years before the first year of the beginning, the two schools of cultivators besieged the two augers, the male auger collapsed from exhaustion, \n when the mother auger gave birth, then into a frenzy, the crowd is no match, so the joint efforts of the two augers sealed in this place, \n the people do not enter.
太初元年前59年初，青丘击神农。\n神农三千名勇士英勇奋战，阻妖族于苍梧。\n\n阿桓，剜一目；\n士孩，头砍三刀；\n文奏，身中七箭；\n……\n当乡，断手足，剖腹；\n力广，剖腹；\n罗应，失踪；\n大海，失踪；\n……\n神农勇士战至一兵一卒，最后无一幸免。=In the early 59th year before the first year of Tai Chu, Qing Qiu struck Shennong. \n Shennong three thousand warriors fought bravely to stop the demon tribe in Cangwu. \n\\nAhwan, plucked out an eye; \n\nShi child, head cut three times; \n\nWen Zai, body hit by seven arrows; \n......\nDangxiang, broken arms and legs, disemboweled; \nLi Guang, disemboweled; \nLuo Ying, missing; \n\nHai Hai, missing; \n......\nShen Nong warriors Battle to a soldier, and finally no one is spared.
太初元年前120年，有陨星坠落于此。\n「星的碎片」通常被人视为“祥瑞”，土地因此再次唱响丰沃的歌谣。\n然而不知何时，某种不可预知的异变开始蔓延。=In 120 years before the first year of the Tai Chou era, a meteorite star fell here. \nThe "fragments of stars" were usually regarded as "auspicious", and the land once again sang a song of fertility. \\However, at some point, some kind of unpredictable mutation began to spread.
上古陨星的坠落地。\n丰收一直持续到了一千年前，如今这里已是死寂一片。\n在深处的紫黑色虚空的引诱下，被夺去心智的生物们前往、靠近……\n甚至触摸它。=The fallen place of the ancient meteorite. The \n harvest lasted until a thousand years ago, and now the place is dead silent. \nLured by the purple-black void in the depths, creatures whose minds have been taken away travel to, approach ......\n and even touch it.
星空中的龙来到地上后建立起青翠葳蕤的绿洲，\n如今却变成了一片黄沙。\n雷霆的赤火的战争刻在了每一位远古先民的记忆里，\n他们高声唱道：\n赤火已枯竭，雷霆亦陨落。\n伟大的国度虽已不在，\n但接到神谕的火焰亡灵们不肯离去，\n只游荡在此处——\n“死亡是阔别已久的重逢，赤帝将在天火中重生。”=The dragon in the starry sky came to the earth and established a verdant oasis,\n but now it has turned into a yellow sand. \nThe war of the red fire of thunder is engraved in the memory of every ancient ancestor. \nThey sang in a loud voice: \nThe red fire has dried up, and the thunder has fallen. \n Although the great kingdom is no more,\n but the flaming dead who received the oracle refused to leave,\n only wandered here - \n "Death is a long-awaited reunion, the Red Emperor will be reborn in the fire of heaven."
传说为龙的埋骨之地，亦称之为「龙墓」。\n年长者向遥远的彼岸启程，远离了祂们的家园。\n无法离开的幼龙接受了人们的信仰，却因此引来嫉恨者，最后招致聚落毁灭。\n无法庇护人的神自然也无法得到人的信仰。\n在往后的一千年里，愤怒的人们拆毁了一切庙宇跟雕像。=Legend has it that it is the place where dragons are buried and is also called the "Dragon's Tomb". \\The elders departed to the other side, far away from their home. \\The young dragons who could not leave accepted the faith of the people, but thus attracted cynics and eventually brought about the destruction of the colony. \nThe god who could not shelter people naturally could not get people's faith. \\In the next thousand years, the angry people demolished all the temples and statues.
沉溺于追求「纯粹灵炁」的古代先民，终于走向了禁忌的领域。\n影子被迫脱离肉身，迷失在灵炁的世界。\n无主的肉身招致星空中的潜伏者的觊觎，在声嘶力竭的抵抗中扭曲成了怪物。\n徒留指甲留在泥土上的血痕。\n不要……靠近……\n千万……\n不要靠近。=The ancient ancestors who indulged in the pursuit of "pure spiritual air" finally went to the forbidden realm. The \n shadow was forced to detach itself from its physical body and was lost in the world of spiritual air. \n's masterless flesh invites the covetousness of the lurkers in the starry sky and twists into a monster in the vocal resistance. \nRemain in vain the bloodstains left by nails on the dirt. \nDo not ...... approach ...... \nNever ...... \ndo not approach.
曾是呼唤日出的仪式之地。\n无法舍弃家园亦无法再维持其存在的龙在此选择“人化”。\n大山中烧起以神性为燃料的天火，\n在火焰中响起的痛苦嘶嚎下。\n龙的鳞片慢慢褪去，\n人的双足逐渐显露。\n……\n他们终归还是成为了这世界的一员。=It was once a place for the ritual of calling for the sunrise. \\The dragon that could not abandon its home and could no longer maintain its existence chose to "humanize" here. \\The fires of the sky, fueled by divinity, burned in the mountains, and the painful hisses rang out from the flames. The scales of the \n dragon slowly faded away, and the feet of the \n man were gradually revealed. \n......\n they became part of this world after all.
曾经流淌甘露与蜜糖的洼地，\n如今作为大地的伤口见证那场旷世的神战。\n众神已然消散。\n但因神力碰撞而隆起的山脉，\n有汹涌的岩浆不断从伤口处流出。\n这是自然的伟力？或是在这之上存在更高的意志？\n不关心答案的氏族，\n利用此处源源不断的热量锻造出新的武器，\n殊不知待到下一场大战的到来……\n也许整个世界都将不复存在。=Once a depression flowing with manna and honey, \n now serves as a wound of the earth to witness that divine war of the ages. \nThe gods have dissipated. \nBut the mountains that had rumbled due to the collision of the gods,\n there was raging magma constantly flowing from the wounds. \nIs this the great power of nature? Or is there a higher will above this? \nClans who do not care about the answer,\n use the constant heat here to forge new weapons,\n unaware that when the next great battle comes ...... \nperhaps the whole world will cease to exist.
《四象灵封》\n孟章神君因追逐日出而坠入海中；\n监兵神君在落日与夜的交界咆哮；\n执明神君向朔方浇筑起寒冰宫殿；\n陵光神君于丹陆唤来不熄的天火；=The Four Elephants of the Spiritual Seal \n the divine ruler of Mengzhang fell into the sea because he was chasing the sunrise; \n the divine ruler of the supervising soldiers roared at the junction of sunset and night; \n the divine ruler of Deiming poured a cold palace to Shuo; \n the divine ruler of Lingguang summoned the unquenchable heavenly fire at Danlu.
传承自最尊贵的血脉，如今却已无人知晓。\n知晓虚假之虚假，方得真实之真实。\n诸恶见善，诸弱知强。\n然而旧日已去，今月不见，神树消亡。\n迷失在强横力量中的一族，再也无法找到前进的方向。\n故曰：天地间无永恒之主角。=Passed down from the most noble bloodline, but now no one knows. \n Knowing the falsehood of falsehood, in order to get the truth of truth. \n All evils see good, all weaknesses know strength. \n Yet the old days are gone, the present moon is gone, the divine tree is extinct. \nThe one who is lost in the strong power can no longer find the way forward. \n Therefore, it is said that there is no eternal protagonist in heaven and earth.
沉醉于旧日余晖的尊贵血脉，\n一心要唤醒长眠中的至尊。\n无法忍受新的生活方式的族人，\n亦随同他们一起脱离原来的族群。\n\n意志，已经消散；\n\n鲜血，仍未凝固；\n\n荣耀，化为枷锁。=The noble bloodline, intoxicated by the afterglow of the old days, was determined to awaken the long-sleeping supreme being. \\The people who could not bear the new way of life, \n also broke away from the original group with them. The will of \n\n has been dissipated; the blood of \n\n has not been solidified; the glory of \n\n has been turned into shackles.
原初；\n归道者；\n森罗万象；\n万族之至尊；\n众天神之天神；\n十日与十二月之父；\n\n——在此处长眠。=In the beginning; \n the Returner of the Way; \n the Morrowind; \n the Supreme of the Nations; \n the God of the Gods; \n the Father of the Tenth Day and the Twelfth Month; \n \n - rests here for a long time.
坠星之战，异形之魔自天外来犯。\n远古的王者，至尊的一击。\n造就破碎大陆；\n故有无垠之水自裂口汩汩而出，淹没大地。\n古之天神感而出，\n以天地为界，山河为纹，勾画出乾坤之理。\n是为「天地大符」。\n无垠之水遂歇。=The battle of the falling star, the devil of the aliens came from beyond the sky. \nThe ancient king, the supreme strike. \nMake the broken continent; \nSo the boundless water gurgles out from the rift and floods the earth. \nThe ancient gods of the heavens sense out, \nTake heaven and earth as boundaries, mountains and rivers as lines, outlining the principles of heaven and earth. \\This is the "Great Symbol of Heaven and Earth". \nThe boundless water then rested.
每逢夜晚便有隐隐的金光逸出，过路的旅人受到金光的吸引而靠近。\n在洞府的深处都说遇到了死去的亲人，如此沉溺其中，日复一日。\n尽管怪谈流传甚广，但洞中冷清依旧。\n金光渐盛，旅人却不复多。=Every night there will be a faint golden light escaping, passing travelers are attracted by the golden light and approach. \nIn the depths of the cave are said to have encountered dead relatives, so indulge in it, day after day. \nDespite the strange rumors circulating widely, the cave remained cold and quiet. \n The golden light grew stronger, but the travelers were no longer numerous.
追寻龙的宝船坠毁于此，破碎的雕像散落于大地之上。\n因此枯萎的地脉受其逸出的灵炁的影响再次焕发出生机。\n荒漠渐渐消失，山峰渐渐隆起。\n水草丰饶，绿树成荫。\n而自有文字以来，却从未见过任何有关宝船的记载。=The treasure ship that pursued the dragon crashed here, and the broken statues were scattered on the earth. The \n thus withered earth veins were brought to life again by the influence of its escaping spiritual air. \nThe desert gradually disappeared and the mountain peaks gradually rose. \nWater and grass were abundant, and green trees became shade. \n And since the beginning of writing, there has never been any record of a treasure ship.
龙最初的降临之地，孽雷肆虐三年不息。\n沾染其气息的生物逐渐显化出龙的特征。\n未能得偿所愿的龙放弃此地，去寻求古之天神的帮助。\n数万年后，有洪荒异兽自孽雷中诞生。\n其状如牛，苍身而无角，一足，出入水则必有风雨；\n其光如日月，其声如雷，其名曰“夔”。=The place where the dragon first descended, sinful thunder raged for three years without end. \\The creature whose breath was tainted by it gradually took on the characteristics of a dragon. \\The dragons who failed to get what they wanted abandoned the place and went to seek the help of the ancient gods. \\Tens of thousands of years later, a beast of the Flood was born from the sinful thunder. \\Its shape was like a cow, with a pale body and no horns, and one foot, and there was always rain and wind when it entered and left the water; its light was like the sun and moon, and its sound was like thunder, and its name was "Kui".
太初元年前997年，南境诸民以「息壤」圣土治水，土遇水而胀，堤坝缺口尽数堵塞，遂大水渐歇。\n太初元年前872年，东州水患频发，南境使者携「息壤」前往，不日平息水患。\n太初元年695年，南境突发大水，夏后氏族以「息壤」堵塞之，水患渐平。\n……\n太初元年前997年，南境有城名为「周仓」，其人、畜一夜之间消失，原因不明。\n太初元年前872年，青丘有国名为「魅离」，半数之妖一夜之间消失，举国震动。\n太初元年695年，南境有城名为「候柱」，其人、畜一夜之间消失，原因不明。\n……=In 997, the first year of Taichu's reign, the people of the southern border used "resting soil" to treat the water, and the soil swelled with water, so that all the gaps in the dam were blocked, and the water gradually stopped. \\In 872, the first year of Taichu's reign, floods occurred frequently in Dongzhou, and the messenger from the southern border brought the "resting soil" to the area and quelled the floods in a short time. \\In 695, the first year of Taichu, the floods broke out suddenly in the southern border, and the Xia Hou clan blocked them with "resting soil", and the floods gradually subsided. \\In 997, the first year of Taichu, the year of ......\n, there was a city named "Zhoucang" in the southern border, and its people and animals disappeared overnight for unknown reasons. \\In 872 years before the first year of Taichu, there was a country named "Mimi Li" in Qingqiu. Half of the demons disappeared overnight and the whole country was shaken. \\In 695, the first year of Taichou, there was a city named "Huzhu" in the southern border, and its people and animals disappeared overnight for unknown reasons. \n......

木中之火，非常容易熄灭。=The fire in the wood is very easy to extinguish.
石中之火，因火行灵气聚集而燃。=The fire in the stone is ignited by the gathering of fire aura.
人间火气孕育而成的火焰，燃烧的是世间的人情冷暖，故才会浑浊不堪。=The flame bred by the fire of the human world, burning the human feelings of the world, so it is muddy.
沾染神性的火焰，据说在神农嶺深处能够找到。=Flames tainted with divinity are said to be able to be found deep within the Shen Nong Ling.
玄鸟每次蜕变都会舍弃原来的羽毛，遗留的羽毛依旧燃烧不殆，经年累月化成异火。=Xuan bird each metamorphosis will give up the original feathers, the feathers left behind still burning, over the years into a foreign fire.
往往在阴气聚集的地方出现，苍白色的奇特火焰，被灼伤者更容易被寒气侵袭。=Often found in places where Yin Qi gathers, pale white peculiar flame, the burned person is more likely to be attacked by the cold.
金、木、水、火、土，蕴含五行之力的神奇火焰。=Gold, wood, water, fire and earth, a magical flame containing the power of the five elements.
天雷互相碰撞燃起的火焰，燃烧时能听到雷鸣声。=The flames ignited by the sky thunder colliding with each other, and thunder can be heard when burning.
五种奇特火焰融合而成，据说是一位上古大能的匠心之作。=The fusion of five strange flames is said to be the artisanal work of an ancient great power.
焚尽一切的火焰，无法用水浇灭，仙人以下触之即死。=The flame that burns everything cannot be quenched by water, and it is dead when touched by immortals or below.
在太阳深处诞生的火焰，蕴含至阳至刚之力。=The flame born in the depths of the sun contains the power of supreme yang and virility.
烛龙吐出的玄火，不仅能焚烧有形之物，也能焚烧无形之物。=The candle dragon spits out the mysterious fire, which can not only burn tangible things, but also invisible things.
佛陀的心火，无法堪破就无法成佛，最后只能将其舍弃。=The Buddha's mind fire, which cannot be broken, cannot become a Buddha, and finally has to be discarded.
老君从外域中采集、经过九九八十一天炼制而成的的紫火，里面蕴含毁天灭地的力量，寻常人根本不敢靠近。=Laojun collected from the outer world, after 91 days of refining the purple fire, which contains the power to destroy the sky and earth, ordinary people simply do not dare to approach.

我派有更光明的未来，已经不想跟弱者同盟了！=My faction has a brighter future and no longer wants to be allied with the weak!
既然你意已决，那就此别过！=Since you have decided, let's say goodbye!
哼！你竟敢如此？今天你与我派断交，明天我派让你高攀不起！=Hmph! How dare you do that? Today you break off relations with our faction, tomorrow our faction will make you unaffordable!
我已经无法忍受你们了！开战斗吧！你们死到临头了！=I can't stand you guys anymore! Let's fight! You're all dead!
哼！你们这是自取灭亡！=Hmph! You are bringing about your own demise!
你们好大的胆子！这下子我们就是不死不休了！=How dare you! Now we'll be dead or alive!
什么？！明年的今天就是你们的祭日！=What?! Next year today is the day of your sacrifice!
争斗带来无意义的死亡，你我何不止戈言和，此次我带着以下诚意而来。=Fighting brings meaningless death, you and I should not just talk peace, this time I come with the following sincerity.
争斗本就非我本意！如果你愿意献上以下物品，那么我可以接受你的建议。=Fighting was not my intention in the first place! If you are willing to offer the following items, then I can accept your offer.
争斗本就非我本意！如果你愿意献上这些东西，那么我可以接受你的建议。=Fighting was not my intention in the first place! If you are willing to offer these things, then I can accept your offer.
哼…哼，此事就此揭过！如有下次勿谓言之不预！=Hm...hm, this matter is over! If there's a next time, don't say it's not a foregone conclusion!
你有什么资本与我派和谈！此事休要再提！=What capital do you have to make peace with our faction! Don't mention this matter again!
师尊！？=Master!
道友！？=Fellow Daoist!
师尊的深意弟子猜不透，今后望师尊保重。=Master's deep meaning disciple can not guess, in the future hope that the master take care.
承蒙师尊栽培多年，今后还望保重，弟子去也。=Thanks to the cultivation of the master for many years, in the future also hope to take care of, disciple also go.
师尊想必是心里已有了计较，就此别过罢！=Master must have a plan in mind, so let's say goodbye!
弟子不知哪里惹恼了师尊，但师尊的教诲我必铭记在心，日后定不会让师门蒙羞。=I don't know where I have annoyed the master, but I will remember the teachings of the master and will not bring shame to the division in the future.
好、好吧，师尊保重，哎，是我太愚钝了吗。=Okay, okay, take care of your master, hey, am I too stupid?
师尊大恩，我没齿难忘。今日弟子下山，请师尊保重。=I will never forget your kindness. Today I am leaving the mountain, please take care of yourself.
师尊？！师尊！！这是为何？罢了…今日我且下山去了。=Master? Master!!! Why is this? Just ... today I and go down the mountain.
师尊曾说“缘起缘灭缘终尽，花开花落花归尘”，看来今日就是那一天了，师尊保重!=The master once said "the origin of the fate of the end of the end, the flower blossoms and flowers return to dust", it seems that today is that day, the master take care!
师尊何故……？弟子心中实在疑惑，罢了弟子今日便下山去。=Master why ......? I am really puzzled in my heart, just disciple today will go down the mountain.
一日为师、终身为父，师尊于我恩同父母，弟子叩首了。此去我定将行善积德、斩妖除魔，弘我门威。=Once a teacher, always a father, the master is as kind to me as a parent, the disciple bowed down. I will go to do good deeds, eliminate demons, and promote the power of my discipline.
道不同，不相为谋。=The path is different, not for each other.
好吧，你会后悔的。=Well, you'll regret it.
哼，我还不想呆了！=Heck, I don't even want to stay!
好，看来你已经有了决断。=Good, it seems you have made up your mind.
好、好吧，道友珍重。=Okay, okay, Daoist friend cherish.
相识乃缘分一场，道友后会有期了。=We know each other is a fate, you will meet again.
好，我这就下山去！=Okay, I'm going down the hill!
那一定有自己的想法，那我们就此别过。=That must have its own ideas, so let's say goodbye.
竟然如此突然？好吧，我们就此别过。=How can it be so sudden? Well, let's say goodbye to that.
好，希望道友以后传道授业顺畅无阻，门派今后无风无雨，告辞了。=Good, I hope that the future preaching and teaching of the Taoist friends smooth and unhindered, the sect in the future without wind and rain, farewell.
奇怪，怎么感觉身上有虫子爬来爬去？=Strange, why do I feel like there are bugs crawling around on my body?
你偷偷摸摸在干什么？！给我滚得远远的。=What are you sneaking around for? Get the hell out of my way.
我想打听有关「云梦」的消息……=I would like to inquire about "Cloud Dream" ......
「云梦」自古以来是修仙者隐居之地。=Since ancient times, "Yunmeng" has been a place where immortal cultivators live in seclusion.
我想打听有关「轩辕丘」的地方……=I would like to inquire about the place of "Xuan Yuan Qiu" ......
「轩辕丘」位于「云梦」北方。="Xuan Yuan Mound" is located in the north of "Yun Meng".

「青丘」位于「云梦」南边。="Qingqiu" is located south of "Yunmeng".
我想打听一下「轩辕氏族」的消息……=I would like to inquire about the "Regulus Clan" ......
轩辕氏族是如今最大的两个氏族之一，首领姬轩辕任用贤能，深得民心，不过听闻他们与「蚩尤氏族」有宿仇……=The Xuan Yuan clan is one of the two largest clans today, and the leader Ji Xuan Yuan has won the hearts of the people by appointing wise people, but I heard that they have a long-standing feud with the "Chi You clan" ......

「黑蛟」乃未化形的龙，蛟过雷劫方能称龙，可想而知它最惧怕的乃是那天雷。=The "black scaly dragon" is not transformed into a dragon, the dragon can be called a dragon only after the thunder tribulation, it can be imagined that it is most afraid of that day of lightning.
我想打听一下「成都载天」的消息……=I would like to inquire about "Chengdu Jaitian" ......
「成都载天」？据说连接通往了一处一处不可知之地，曾有人在那里见过许多截教之人。=The "Chengdu Sky"? It is said that the connection leads to an unknowable place, where many people of the sect have been seen.
我想打听一下「建木」的消息……=I would like to inquire about "Kenwood" ......

我想打听一下「封神台」的消息……=I'd like to inquire about the "Sealing Platform" ......

修炼一途，理应披荆斩棘，一往无前。=Cultivation of a path, should be pushed through the thorns, and go forward.
道友所言极是。=What you say is very true.
身处乱世之中，理应斩断世俗尘缘，一心向道。=In the midst of the chaotic world, it is right to cut off the world's dusty ties and turn one's heart to the Way.
阁下求道之心竟如此坚定，我好生佩服。=I admire you for being so determined in your quest for the Way.
万物有灵，我们应善待妖兽……=Everything has a spirit, we should be kind to demon animals ......
道友所言甚是，我相信每个生灵都应该受到平等对待。=What you say is very true, I believe that every living being should be treated equally.
你怎么如此幼稚？羊吃草，人吃肉乃是天经地义！=Why are you so naive? It is only natural that sheep eat grass and people eat meat!
人族与妖族和平共处……=Peaceful coexistence between the human and demon races ......
我心中只向往长生大道，并不关心此事。=I only aspire to the path of eternal life in my heart and do not care about it.
不错！争斗只会带来死亡，创造不了任何的事物。=Not bad! Fighting only brings death and creates nothing.
可笑！非我族类，其心必异！这是自古以来就证明了的道理！=Ridiculous! If you're not one of us, you're different! This is a truth that has been proven since ancient times!
修士拥有了强大的力量，就应该去帮助弱小。=When a monk has great power, he should go to help the weak.
我只在乎亲近之人的状况，他人之事与我何干呢？=I only care about the condition of those close to me, what does it matter to me what happens to others?
人们总是因为力量而心生傲慢，道友有这样的觉悟，实在令我钦佩！=People are always arrogant because of their power. I admire you for having such an awareness!
非也！人心难明、忠奸难辨！并不能因力量强弱而决定谁应该受到帮助啊！=No! It is hard to know the hearts of people and to distinguish between loyalty and treachery! It is not a matter of strength to decide who should be helped!
朋友之间应该以诚相待，才不负情意。=Friends should treat each other with sincerity in order to live up to the sentiment.
如此说也不错，但真心待人本就是最基本的道义。=It's not bad to say so, but treating people with sincerity is the most basic morality.
道友重情重义，我甚是钦佩，倘若人人都像道友如此，何愁不见太平盛世。=If everyone is like you, there will be no worries about the peace and prosperity.
哼！放眼望去，朋友背叛的情形比比皆是！这不可靠，世间只有亲缘才是血浓于水！=Hmph! When you look around, friends betraying each other are everywhere! This is not reliable, the only thing in this world is blood is thicker than water!
修道修道，乃是为天下苍生而修道！=Monasticism is the monasticism for the world's people!
大道万千，道友这是过于狭隘了。=There are thousands of great paths, you are too narrow-minded.
确实如此，人族就是互相帮助才能度过难关、延续至今，这才是拥有力量的意义。=Indeed, it is true that the human race is to help each other to get through and continue to this day, and that is the meaning of having power.
天下苍生？先顾好自己吧！道友莫要学那些伪君子泛泛而谈！=The people of the world? Take care of yourself first! Don't be like those hypocrites who talk in generalities!
妖兽凶狠，还是不要接近为妙！=Demonic beasts are vicious, or do not approach for good!
不错，这些孽畜法力高强，道行低微之人最好还是绕道吧。=Good, these sinful animals have high magical power, the low Daoist people better go around it.
说得太对了！世间险恶，我们就应该如履薄冰，处处为营。=That's so true! The world is a dangerous place, so we should walk on thin ice and camp everywhere.
哼！如此胆小慎微，实在是不够爽快！=Hmph! So timid and cautious, it's just not cool enough!
非我族类，我们应该警惕异族！=Not my people, we should be wary of the alien race!
真的需要如此小心？在我眼中只有讲理与不讲理之人。=Do you really need to be so careful? In my eyes there are only reasonable and unreasonable people.
不错，生于忧患死于安乐！我族历经千年不倒，就是因为人人都有一颗防范之心。=Yes, born in worry and die in peace and happiness! Our clan has survived for thousands of years because everyone has a heart of precaution.
同族亦能相残，难道还少吗？屈服欲望之人才最需要我们防范！=Is it not too much to say that people of the same race can kill each other? It is those who give in to their desires that we need to guard against!
大道路上多磨难，其实平平安安才是福……=Many trials and tribulations on the road, in fact, peace and quiet is the blessing ......
尽管如此，我也不会忘却追求大道的心。=Nevertheless, I will not forget my heart to pursue the Way.
不错，世上天资卓越者终归少数，大多数人根本无法战胜大道上的苦难。对他们而言，安稳才是合适的追求。=It is true that the world's gifted people are ultimately a minority, and most of them simply cannot overcome the hardships of the Way. For them, stability is the appropriate pursuit.
胸无大志！你太懦弱了，大道就在那里，攀登绝壁高峰才是不枉此生！=You have no ambition! You are too cowardly, the road is there, climbing the peak of the wall is not a life in vain!
行走世间，防人之心不可无。=Walking in the world, you can't be immune to people's fears.
防人之心确实该有，但也不需要杯弓蛇影。=It's true that you should be defensive, but you don't need to cup your fingers.
正是如此！兄弟反目、朋友背叛，饥荒之年人竞相食！我们就是这般丑陋地活于世间。=That's exactly what happened! Brothers turning against each other, friends betraying each other, people competing for food in a year of famine! This is how ugly we live in the world.
非也，如果处处防范，那还能交到几个知己呢？这是恰恰是保守懦弱的表现。=No, if every precaution, then how many confidants can be made? This is precisely the expression of conservative cowardice.
人心复杂，岂能简单用善恶作判断。=The human heart is complex and cannot be judged simply by good or evil.
善恶本是泾渭分明之事，简单与复杂又从何说起呢？=Good and evil are clear-cut things, so where does the simplicity and complexity begin?
哎！不错！世间之事坏就坏在你中有我，我中有你，这真是剪不断理还乱。=Hey! Not bad! The bad thing in the world is that you have me and I have you, and this is really confusing.
哼！你这完全是和稀泥的做法！我们总会面临抉择的时候！=Hmph! You are totally making peace with this! We will always face a time of choice!
妖兽为祸一方，我见到必杀之！=The demon beast is a scourge, I will kill it when I see it!
是该如此，但是杀生过甚也并不是件好事。=That's true, but it's not good to kill too much.
平妖荡寇之事，我辈义不容辞！道友有心了！=We are duty-bound to fight demons and invaders! You have a heart!
道友杀心未免太重！如若遇到温驯无害的妖兽该如何？他们不也能为我们所驱使吗！=You have too much heart to kill! What if we meet a gentle and harmless demonic beast? They can also be driven by us!
当断不断反受其乱！=When the break is made, it's a mess!
话虽如此，但是很多时候我们会受自身感情牵绊…也许这就是修为不到家吧。=Having said that, many times we are tied to our own feelings...perhaps this is a lack of practice.
说得好！多少谋事之人差就差在这个“断”字！=Well said! How many people are not as good as the word "break"!
莽夫行为！心急吃不了热豆腐，有时候事情是越急办得越差。=Reckless behavior! The heart can not eat hot tofu, sometimes things are the more urgent to do the worse.
岁月催人老，不能长生终究是身死道消。=The years push people to grow old, can not live forever is ultimately the death of the road.
道友何须悲观，长生路不也是我们记忆、情感、经历的路吗，这路上肯定会留下美好的事物。=Taoist friends do not need to be pessimistic, the road to eternal life is not also the road of our memories, emotions, experiences, this road will certainly leave beautiful things.
不错！我们平日里勤修不缀就是为了得窥大道，有道是：朝闻道夕死足矣。=Good! We are diligent in our daily practice is to get a glimpse of the Way, there is a way: to hear the Way and die is enough.
非也！世间何处不是修行？修道在心不在力，更在一个过程，如果只追求结果未免本末倒置。=No! Where in the world is not practice? Practice is in the heart, not in the strength, but in a process, if only the pursuit of results is not to put the cart before the horse.
情爱会阻止我修炼的速度！=Love will stop the speed of my practice!
有时候情感的牵绊确实扰乱心境，但是割舍七情六欲属实不是件易事。=Sometimes the emotional ties do disturb the mind, but it is not easy to give up the seven emotions.
不错！时间宝贵，岂能因为儿女情长耽搁？=Not bad! Time is precious, how can it be delayed because of children's love?
肤浅！不试过情欲的滋味，超脱又有何意义？你这属实是末等之法！=Superficiality! What is the point of transcendence if you have not tried lust? You are really the last resort!
人活一世理应忠实于自己的欲望，快意恩仇！=People should live a life faithful to their own desires, fast and furious!
修炼一途，便是要战胜自我的欲望，贪嗔痴、怨憎会、恨别离……=Cultivation of a way, is to overcome the desire of the self, greed, hatred, hate and separation ......
不错，道友真是明白人！如若瞻前顾后，活着又有什么滋味呢？=Good, you really understand! If you look ahead and back, what is it like to live?
不可，人心背后本就是欲壑难填！如果加以克制，恐造成灭顶之灾。=No, behind the heart is a desire that cannot be filled! If it is restrained, it may lead to the end of the world.
妖兽虽然凶残，但我也不惧！=Although the demon beast is ferocious, but I am not afraid!
真的有那么自信吗？到时候可别落荒而逃的好。=Are you really that confident? When the time comes, don't fall away good.
哈哈！好，这妖兽又何惧之，我辈中人就应该有如此胆魄！=Haha! Good, this demon beast and what to fear, my generation of people should have such courage!
哼，有勇无谋！遇到妖兽是进是退，当然得冷静分析！倘若敌强我弱就更不能自取灭亡了。=Humph, courageous but not resourceful! When you encounter a demonic beast, you have to analyze it calmly! If the enemy is strong and I am weak, it is even more important not to take their own life.
异族与我们只有修为高低的区别罢了！=The alien race and we only have the difference between the level of cultivation!
不是吧？万族外形各异，更有甚者拥有狼的眼、鱼的鳞、飞鸟的翅膀…相去甚远。=Is not it? All races are different in appearance, and some even have the eyes of a wolf, the scales of a fish, the wings of a bird of prey...far from each other.
说得好！修为确实是对实力衡量的一个标准…修为强的人往往掌握更强的话语权…到时候种族之分没有任何的意义。=Well said! Cultivation is indeed a measure of strength...people with strong cultivation tend to hold a stronger voice...at that point the racial distinction has no meaning.
无知！异族强横之处在于肉身和变化之术，终日打鹰，当心被鹰啄了眼去！=Ignorance! The strong point of the foreigners is the physical body and the art of change, all day long to fight the eagle, beware of being pecked by the eagle eyes to go!
倘若给我三十年…我定能堪破大道！=If you give me 30 years...I will be able to break through the Great Dao!
三十年？厉害了，恐怕我得修炼十个三十年。=Thirty years? Awesome, I'm afraid I have to cultivate ten thirty years.
道友的这份自信，实属让人颤抖！这就是修炼者吗，我着实佩服了。=This self-confidence of you, Daoist, really makes people tremble! Is this the cultivator, I really admire it.
阿这？你明明那么普通，为何可以那么自信？=Ah this? You are obviously so ordinary, why can you be so confident?
洞府遗迹虽然凶险，但只要准备万全又有何惧？=Although the cave ruins are dangerous, but as long as the preparation of all have no fear?
不错，凡事预则立不预则废。=Yes, everything that is done in advance is done in advance.
此番话真是真知灼见，万物阴阳相济，不错！这些地方虽然凶险，但必定有克制之法。=These words are really insightful, the yin and yang of all things are good! Although these places are dangerous, but there must be a way to restrain.
道高一尺魔高一丈，不是每个险地都能去闯一闯的！那些禁地夺天地之造化，天神也不敢轻易深入，小心枉送性命！=The high road is one foot high devil, not every dangerous place can go to break through! Those forbidden places to seize the creation of heaven and earth, the gods do not dare to easily go deep, beware of the waste of life!
大道难成，但也因人而异，像我这般天资者……=The great path is difficult to become, but also varies from person to person, like me, a natural talent ......
我看道友天灵盖有一道灵气喷出，想必就是百年难得一见的修炼奇才，佩服，佩服！=I see that you have an aura emitted from the sky, I think it must be a rare cultivation wizard, admire, admire!
哈哈哈，说得好，像你我这般天纵奇才，何不携手共登大道顶峰呢？=Hahahaha, well said, like you and I such a natural talent, why not work together to ascend to the top of the Avenue?
呵呵！自信是好事，盲目自信可就是愚蠢了！君不见长生路上多少天才夭折……=Oh! Self-confidence is good, blind confidence is stupid! You do not see how many geniuses died on the road to immortality ......
以我之实力，开宗立派也不为过了吧。=With my strength, it's not too much to start a sect.
我看行，不过既然你能行，想必我也可以吧？=I think it's fine, but since you can do it, I guess I can too, right?
我看道友一表人才，气度非凡，一看就有掌门之相！哈哈哈哈……=I see that you are a talented man, extraordinary temperament, a look at the face of the master! Hahahahaha ......
不会吧，不会吧？不会真的有人觉得自己是大宗师吧？好为人师，那属实自大……=No way, no way! No one really thinks they are a great master, right? It's arrogant to be a teacher ......

我们修士可以说是离不开这些妖兽材料了，多多益善才好呢。=We cultivators can say that we can't live without these demon beast materials, more is better than better.
不错，道友真是颇有见地！能为我所用的都是好东西！=Not bad, you are really insightful! Anything I can use is a good thing!
愚蠢！你这就误入歧途了，这些乃是外物！修炼己身才是最上乘的方式！=Foolishness! You've gone astray, these are external things! Cultivating your own body is the best way!
只要为我所用，异族、人族都是一样！=As long as it is for my use, foreigners and human beings are the same!
是也不是，既然可以交流那么对大道的追求应该时一致的才对，但异族跟我们的思维方式实在相差甚远……=Yes and no, since we can communicate then the pursuit of the Way should be consistent, but the foreigners and our way of thinking is really far apart ......
理应如此！无所不用其极，才能超越其他人！=As it should be! Doing everything to get ahead of everyone else!
道友功利心也太重了！万族的价值远远不止于此，他们的精神、他们的文明都将成为太初世界永世流传的瑰宝……=You are too utilitarian! The value of the Ten Thousand Clans is far more than that, their spirit and their civilization will become the treasures of the world of the beginning of time ......
朋友只是一群因为相同利益而聚集的人罢了…=Friends are just a group of people who gather because of the same interests...
道友未免过于极端……朋友嘛，确实能在给予一些外物的帮助…可豁出姓名帮助朋友的人焉在少数？=Taoist friends are too extreme ...... friends well, indeed in giving some external help ... can give up their names to help friends in the minority?
对极了！天下熙熙皆为利来，天下攘攘皆为利往！本就是互相利用的关系，有何不可？=That's right! The world is bustling with profit, the world is bustling with profit! We are just using each other, why not?
非也！如此功利怕是会错失知己！人生能有几个知己？这是本末倒置！=No! I'm afraid I'll miss my soulmate if I'm so utilitarian! How many confidants can you have in life? This is putting the cart before the horse!
凡人擅长采集资源，我也是非常中意的。=Mortals are good at gathering resources, and I am very fond of them.
把凡人当作采收资源的工具吗？这…这未免有点……=Using mortals as tools for harvesting resources? That's...that's a bit ......
哈哈，尽管是蝼蚁也有利用的价值，蝼蚁就应该要有蝼蚁的样子、=Haha, even if it's a mole, there is a value of use, a mole should have the appearance of a mole.

不错！硬才是真道理！当然我是指拳头…只有自己能做主的，才是真的！=Not bad! Hard is the real deal! Of course I mean the fist...only what you can do for yourself is true!
愚蠢！起初是用理由说服自己去探寻禁忌之路，然后就是食髓知味，人往往就是这样一步步迈入深渊的…=Foolishness! At first it was a reason to convince oneself to explore the forbidden path, and then it was a taste for it, and this is how people often step into the abyss...

无知！人族本就一体，更应团结，人力有穷时，修士也如此，何况覆巢之下安有完卵？仙凡分化只能带来不幸！=Ignorance! 在路过${区域}${地界}的${建筑}时，竟与仇人${角色}相遇，但对方也是失意之人，一时间只想埋头痛饮，便与${角色}比拼酒力，最终在酒的作用下反而忘记了仇恨，从此与${角色}不再是仇人了。=In passing through the ${area} ${buildings} of the ${land}, actually met with the enemy ${role}, but the other party is also a lost person, a time only want to bury their heads in the drink, so they compete with ${role} alcoholic strength, and eventually under the effect of wine instead of forgetting the hatred, from then on, and ${role} is no longer an enemy.

酒家结为好友=The wine family has made friends

半神之体=Demigod Body

纯阴道体=Pure vaginal body

战斗机制=Combat Mechanics
战斗宇宙=Combat Universe
「上下四方曰宇，往古来今曰宙。」\n\n战斗空间\n相邻八方皆可往之，邻边距离为2米，对角距离为3米\n\n战斗时间\n任一角色行动时，时间将暂时停留在这一瞬。角色速度越快，两次行动间隔的秒数越短。角色预计行动时间点将在顶部的时间轴显示="Up and down the four directions is called the universe, the past and the present is called the universe." \n\\nBattle space\nAdjacent eight sides are available to it, the distance between adjacent sides is 2 meters, the diagonal distance is 3 meters\n\n\nBattle time\nAny character action, time will temporarily stay in this instant. The faster the character is, the shorter the number of seconds between actions. The point at which the character is expected to act will be displayed in the timeline at the top
查看详情=View Details
右键点击地面格子可以查看地块详情\n右键点击怪物可以查看怪物详情\n右键点击人物可以查看人物详情=Right-click on the ground grid to view plot details \n Right-click on the monster to view monster details \n Right-click on the character to view character details
自然属性=Natural Properties
八大灵根与自然属性=The eight spiritual roots and natural attributes
 -五行灵根，当前灵根与各个自然属性间的关系决定了基础抗性\n对同我者有较高的抗性加成；对生我者有较低的抗性加成；对我生者有中等的抗性削减；对克我者有极高的抗性削减；对我克者有中等的抗性加成\n\n -阴灵根，有极高的阳抗性削减\n -阳灵根，有极高的阴抗性削减\n -混元灵根，对各属性抗性比较平均\n\n记不住也没关系，战斗中随时可以鼠标右键点击任一角色查看他的自然属性抗性=-The five elements of spiritual roots, the current relationship between spiritual roots and each natural attribute determines the base resistance \n higher resistance bonus for those who are with me; lower resistance bonus for those who are born with me; moderate resistance reduction for those who are born with me; very high resistance reduction for those who are grammed with me; moderate resistance bonus for those who are grammed with me \n\n -Yin spiritual roots, very high Yang resistance reduction \n -Yang spiritual roots, very high Yin resistance reduction \n -Mixed spiritual roots, the resistance to each attribute is relatively average \n\n don't care if you can't remember, you can always right click on any character during the battle to see his natural attribute resistance
吟唱机制=Chanting mechanism
持续吟唱=Continuous chanting
持续吟唱法诀能调动更多的灵力注入招式中，进而造成异常强大的效果。\n\n但在瞬息万变的战场，此举无疑会暴露更多的破绽\n -持续吟唱会被控制技能（眩晕、位移、沉默等）打断\n -在吟唱完毕前离开受影响范围\n\n把握时机，控制敌人是躲避对手吟唱技能与自己吟唱技能命中的关键=Continuous chanting of spells can mobilize more spiritual energy into the moves, which in turn can cause exceptionally powerful effects. \n\nBut in the ever-changing battlefield, this move will undoubtedly expose more vulnerabilities\n -Continuous chanting can be interrupted by control skills (stun, displacement, silence, etc.) \n -Leaving the affected area before the chanting is finished \n\nGetting a grip on the timing and controlling the enemy is the key to avoiding opponent chanting skills and hitting with your own chanting skills
行动点机制=Action Point Mechanism
行动点数与策略=Action Points and Strategies
每个角色的行动点数由行动点与移动点两部分构成\n -行动点-可用于释放技能\n -移动点-可用于移动一定距离，同时一颗完整的移动点等于行动点\n\n智者运筹帷幄，既要在合适的时机用光行动点以削减敌方战力，也要等待时机，以使角色在关键时间点行动。\n -结束行动-角色保留行动点数在3点以下时，将正常结束行动。角色将在一定的行动间隔秒数后再次行动\n -等待时机-当角色若保留3点及以上行动点，等待时机替换结束行动。在扣除2点行动点后，每剩余1点行动点，则下次行动提前20%=Each character's action points consist of two parts: action points and movement points \n - action points - can be used to release skills \n - movement points - can be used to move a certain distance, while a complete movement point is equal to an action point \n \n The wise man plans his strategy, both to use up action points at the right time to cut the enemy's battle power, and to wait for the right time to make the character act at the critical point in time. \n - End Action - When a character retains less than 3 action points, he or she will end the action normally. The character will act again after a certain number of seconds between actions \n - Wait for the timing - When the character retains 3 or more action points, wait for the timing to replace the end action. After deducting 2 action points, the next action will be advanced by 20% for every 1 action point remaining
战斗受伤机制=Combat injury mechanism
内伤与元气大伤=Internal injuries and major meta-vital injuries
你的角色在战斗中似乎受了不轻的伤，尽快使用丹药为角色疗伤\n\n「内伤」每层会让角色最大生命值-10%\n -角色血量最低降至50%，战斗结束后将获得1层「内伤」\n -角色血量最低降至30%，战斗结束后将获得2层「内伤」\n -角色血量最低降至10%，战斗结束后将获得3层「内伤」\n\n「元气大伤」会让角色全属性-10\n -战斗中角色血量降为 0 时，角色会退场并且获得「元气大伤」\n -「元气大伤」期间角色血量再次降为 0 则永久死亡=Your character seems to have been wounded badly during the battle, use the potion to heal your character as soon as possible \n\n "Internal Wounds" each layer will make the character's maximum life value -10% \n - the character's blood level drops to a minimum of 50%, after the battle is over, you will get 1 layer of "Internal Wounds" \n - the character's blood level drops to a minimum of 30%, after the battle is over, you will get 2 layers of "Internal Wounds" \n - the character's blood level drops to a minimum of 10%, after the battle is over, you will If the character's blood level drops to 0 during the battle, the character will retire and will receive a "great wound" \n - If the character's blood level drops to 0 again during the "great wound" period, the character will die permanently
阻挡物=Barrier
新手教学测试图片=Novice teaching test pictures
阻挡物\n由法术效果带来的，在战斗棋盘格子上召唤出来的物体，大部分阻挡物会阻碍角色，角色亦不能移动到有该物体的格子上\n\n阻挡弹道\n阻挡物体能够阻挡法术弹道，多加利用或能在战斗中取得优势=Blocking objects \n by spell effects, objects summoned on the battle board grid, most blocking objects will obstruct the character, the character can not move to the grid with the object \n \n blocking ballistics \n blocking objects can block the spell ballistics, more use may be able to gain an advantage in the battle
地形效果=Terrain effect
由法术引起的地形变化，站在上面的角色或者怪物将会受其影响\n（善用地形效果可以主导战局，请多加利用）=The terrain change caused by the spell, the character or monster standing on it will be affected by it \n (make good use of the terrain effect can dominate the battle, please make more use of it)
门派引导=Sect guidance
门派属性\n门派等级、门派人数、门派声望、门派善恶为基础属性，功德值、气运值为高级属性\n -门派等级-通常作为某些门派天命的前置条件\n -门派人数-可通过门派天命提高一定的上限\n -门派声望-门派在太初世界里的知名度，提高声望可获得吸引更多求道者以及互易优惠等益处\n -门派善恶-会影响其他门派或是修士对你的门派的看法\n -功德值-由大事件获得，作为在使用某些建筑的功能时的消耗资源\n -气运-由弟子产出，作为在使用某些建筑的功能时的消耗资源=Faction Attributes \n - Faction Level, Faction Number, Faction Reputation, Faction Good and Evil are basic attributes, Merit Value and Qi Luck Value are advanced attributes \n - Faction Level - usually used as a pre-requisite for certain Faction Mandates \n - Faction Number - can be increased to a certain limit through Faction Mandates \n - Faction Reputation - the faction's popularity in the World of the Primordial, increasing reputation can attract more seekers and reciprocal benefits, etc. Benefit - -Denominational good and evil - affects the perception of your denomination by other denominations or monks. n -Merit value - obtained from major events and used as a resource for using certain building functions. n -Qi luck - obtained from disciples and used as a resource for using certain building functions.
门派天命\n消耗一定的气运激活相应的天命，按照你的想法打造你的门派。在这里可以选择不同的门派发展方向，或是解锁一些门派建筑\n\n门派建筑\n常规建筑有炼丹房、炼器室、藏经阁、道场。其他建筑可通过门派天命解锁\n\n建筑事件\n受风水地势的影响，门派内的建筑会根据概率发生一些事件，这些事件会带来好的影响或坏的影响=Sect Heavenly Mandate\nConsume certain amount of Qi to activate the corresponding Heavenly Mandate and build your sect according to your idea. Here you can choose different sect development directions or unlock some sect buildings \n\n sect buildings \n regular buildings are alchemy room, alchemy room, scripture collection pavilion, dojo. Other buildings can be unlocked through the sect providence \n\n building events \n affected by feng shui terrain, the buildings in the sect will happen some events according to the probability, these events will bring good effects or bad effects
名册教学=Roster Teaching
求道者名册=Roster of seekers
名册引导=Roster guide
名册收徒\n意欲加入门派的散修们会通过求道者名册来传达他们的意愿，可以在求道者名册上进行收徒\n\n名册刷新\n门派声望越高，刷新出高品质求道者的概率越高=The higher the reputation of the sect, the higher the probability of refreshing high quality seekers.
炼丹房教学=Alchemy room teaching
炼丹房=Alchemy Room
炼丹房建筑=Alchemy room building
标准炼丹\n根据丹方上的要求投放材料（需解锁丹方），从而炼制出丹药的常规炼制方法\n\n五行炼丹\n根据推算出丹药五行配比，以自己对材料五行的理解自由搭配炼丹材料，在不解锁丹方的情况下也能炼制出丹药=Standard alchemy \n the conventional method of refining Dans by putting materials according to the requirements on the Recipe (need to unlock the Recipe) \n \n five elements of alchemy \n according to the projected ratios of the five elements of the Dans, with their own understanding of the five elements of the materials to freely match the materials of alchemy, without unlocking the Recipe can also refine the Dans
阵势教学=Formation teaching
阵势=Formation
阵势引导=Formation guidance
炼丹先决\n炼制丹药的先决条件，必须有人维持阵势方可炼丹\n\n阵势方位\n解锁阵势图后，通过阵势弟子的灵根属性与炼丹方位的组合激活阵势图，提高炼丹效率=Alchemy prerequisite \n the prerequisite for making Dans, there must be someone to maintain the formation in order to alchemy \n \n the formation orientation \n unlocking the formation map, through the combination of the formation disciple's spiritual root attributes and alchemy orientation to activate the formation map to improve the efficiency of alchemy
炼丹教学=Teaching alchemy
炼丹要素=Elements of alchemy
炼丹引导=Alchemy guidance
炼器室教学=Blacksmith teaching
炼器室=Weapon making room
炼器室建筑=Alchemy room building
铸造\n根据器方上的要求，投放炼制材料炼器以此获得新法宝\n\n淬炼\n在原有法宝的基础上，加入新材料加以淬炼以此获得新法宝=Casting \nAccording to the requirements on the weapon Recipe, put refining materials to refine the weapon so as to obtain a new magic treasure \n\nHardening \nBased on the original magic treasure, add new materials to quench so as to obtain a new magic treasure
铸造教学=Foundry Teaching
炼器要素=Refining elements
铸造引导=Casting guidance
器方\n炼器必不可少的配方\n\n必须材料\n炼器时必须的、最低限度的材料\n\n额外材料\n给法宝加持五行词缀所需要的材料\n\n词缀\n根据额外材料的五行总量的多寡，赋予炼制中的法宝词缀\n根据稀有度分为1~3级，最多可的得到3个词缀=Weapon Recipe \n Recipe essential for refining \n \n necessary materials \n minimum materials necessary for refining \n \n additional materials \n materials needed to enchant a magic treasure with five elemental affixes \n \n affixes \n affixes \n affixes given to magic treasures in refining according to the total number of five elements of additional materials \n divided into 1~3 levels according to rarity, up to 3 affixes can be obtained
淬炼教学=Hardened Teaching
淬炼=Hardening
淬炼引导=Hardening guide
法宝淬炼\n解锁器方后将同步解锁它的淬炼路径，所谓的淬炼即是挖掘法宝深层的潜力\n淬炼后的法宝威力将会增强，并且有可能得到新的技能=The quenching of magic treasure \n unlocking the weapon side will simultaneously unlock its quenching path, the so-called quenching is to explore the deep potential of the magic treasure \n quenching the magic treasure power will be enhanced, and may get new skills
道场教学=Dojo Teaching
道场建筑=Dojo building
修道\n可以在此处指定弟子修道，让其获得人物经验\n（修道中时无法进行炼丹、炼器等工作）=Cultivation \n you can designate a disciple to cultivate here, so that he or she can gain character experience \n (can't do alchemy, smithing, etc. while cultivating)
藏经阁教学=Teaching in the Library of the Bible
藏经阁=Tibetan Buddhist Temple
藏经阁建筑=Tibetan Buddhist temple building
阅书\n学习新功法（功法与术法）的场所\n\n悟道\n完善、补全功法残卷的场所=A place to read books \n learn new gongfa (gongfa and jutsu) \n \n enlightenment \n perfect and complete the remnants of gongfa
习道教学=Teaching in the Way of Learning
修道=practice Daoism
习道引导=Guidance on the Way of Practice
习道条件\n不同的功法会有不同的学习条件，例如灵根属性、悟性、境界等要求\n\n指定传道之师\n -内门弟子-内门弟子可以让自己的师傅或藏经阁长老指点自己，提高效率\n -外门弟子-外门弟子只可以让藏经阁长老指点自己=Learning conditions \n Different techniques will have different learning conditions, such as spiritual root attributes, enlightenment, realm and other requirements \n \n Designated preacher \n - Inner disciples - Inner disciples can let their own master or the elders of the Book of Scripture instruct them, improve efficiency \n - Outer disciples - Outer disciples can only let the elders of the Book of Scripture instruct them
悟道教学=Teaching the Way of Enlightenment
悟道=the Way of Enlightenment
悟道引导=Gnosis Guidance
完善残卷\n指定一名角色完善功法残卷，完善残卷会有悟性与境界上的要求\n\n辅助物品\n提高悟道效率的消耗性物品\n\n心境值\n在完善功法残卷的过程中需要持续消耗心境值，当心境值降为0时，悟道中止=\n Specify a character to perfect the residual scrolls, there are requirements for enlightenment and realm to perfect the residual scrolls \n \n Auxiliary items \n Expendable items to improve the efficiency of enlightenment \n \n Mind value \n In the process of perfecting the residual scrolls of feats, you need to continuously consume the mind value, when the mind value drops to 0, enlightenment is suspended
人物界面教学=Character interface teaching
人物=People
人物界面=Character Interface
人物界面引导=Character interface guide
角色突破\n经验值储满后，角色会遇到瓶颈，成功突破后便可升至下一境界\n\n属性加点\n角色使用辅助丹药突破大境界时将会获得一定的属性点，可以自由选择加在哪项属性上\n\n功法替换\n可以根据自身的战术需求替换功法（包括心法、术法），功法需要对应的书籍进行学习\n\n战斗佩囊\n在此处选择战斗中要使用的道具，谨慎选择你认为对下场战斗有用的道具=Character breakthrough \nAfter the experience value is stored full, the character will encounter a bottleneck, after a successful breakthrough, you can ascend to the next realm \n\nAttribute points \nThe character will get a certain number of attribute points when using auxiliary Dans to break through the major realm, you can freely choose which attribute to add \n\nGong method replacement \nYou can replace the gong method according to your own tactical needs (including the heart method and art method), the gong method needs the corresponding book to learn \n\nBattle pouch\nSelect the props to be used in the battle here, carefully choose the props you think are useful for the next battle
百草园教学=Bacchanal Teaching
百草园=Bacchus Garden
百草园建筑=Bacchus Garden Architecture
种植\n消耗一株植物，成熟后可收获3~5株\n生长周期\n五行属性总量越高的植物，生长成熟所需时间越长\n收获\n待到生长成熟，可点击鼠标左键进行收获=Planting \n consume one plant and harvest 3~5 plants after maturity \n growth cycle \n the higher the total number of five attributes, the longer it takes to grow and mature \n harvest \n wait until the growth is mature, you can click the left mouse button to harvest
门派天命教学=Teaching the sect's destiny
门派天命引导=Sect Divine Guidance
天命选择\n门派天命决定了一门的发展战略，可以消耗门派气运开启某项天命，或者对其进行加持\n（解锁炼器槽位、炼丹槽位、百草园地块……）=Heavenly destiny selection \n the sect heavenly destiny determines the development strategy of a door, you can consume sect qi luck to open a certain heavenly destiny, or to enrich it \n (unlock the refining slot, alchemy slot, hundred herb garden plots ......)
请神台教学=Inviting the gods to teach
请神台=Invocation
请神台建筑=Invitation to the shrine building
神佑\n选择一位主神庇佑，不同的主神拥有不同的符箓倾向，可消耗功德值解锁符箓\n\n请神\n通过供奉法事提升神祇好感，法事规模根据供奉的物品的元素总量决定\n\n制符\n耗费一定的神祇好感制作符箓，当神祇好感降为最低值时，不能再进行制符=God blessing \n choose a main god to bless, different main gods have different talisman tendencies, can consume merit value to unlock talisman \n \n invite gods \n raise god goodwill by offering puja, puja scale is determined by the total amount of elements of the item offered \n \n make talisman \n consume a certain amount of god goodwill to make talisman, when god goodwill drops to the lowest value, no more talisman making can be done
请仙台教学=Please teach at Sendai
请神=invoke the gods
请神引导=Ask God for guidance
供奉等级\n通过提升神祇好感升级，供奉等级提高后可以解锁符箓，每次制符都会消耗当前供奉等级内的神祇好感\n\n元素值\n供奉物品的具体元素值，不同的神祇有不同的属性偏好，偏好属性会获得供奉加成\n\n法事规模\n供奉的物品的元素总量越高，法事规模越大，每回合增加的神祇好感越多=Consecration level \n is upgraded by raising the goodwill of the deity, the higher the consecration level is, the more talismans can be unlocked, each talisman making consumes the goodwill of the deity within the current consecration level \n \n elemental value \n the specific elemental value of the consecrated item, different deities have different attribute preferences, the preferred attribute will gain the consecration bonus \n \n puja scale \n the higher the total amount of elements of the consecrated item, the larger the puja scale is, the more each round The more goodwill of the deity is increased
大地图教学=Large map teaching
大地图=Large Map
自由探索=Free Exploration
大地图引导1=Large map guide 1
尽情探索这个世界吧！认识这个世界，与这个世界交流！\n（——点击鼠标左键移动到下个节点上，此举会消耗你小队的行动力，当行动力耗尽时请点击回合结束等待回复）\n\n（——默认按住WASD键可以移动视窗，也可按住鼠标左键拖动移动）\n\n（——默认按F键重置人物视角）=Explore the world to your heart's content! Get to know this world, communicate with this world! \n\n (- click the left mouse button to move to the next node, this move will consume your squad's action power, when the action power is exhausted, please click the end of the turn to wait for a reply) \n\n (- default hold down the WASD key to move the window, you can also hold down the left mouse \n\n (- default press the F key to reset the character view)
大地图引导2=Large map guide 2
在你探索世界的过程中，你会遭遇种种事件。\n也许会遇到天上掉下的馅饼的事情……或是遇到不怀好意之人的攻击……亦或是面临必须作出艰难决定的时刻……\n（——你会如何抉择呢？）=In the course of your exploration of the world, you will encounter a variety of events. \nMaybe you will encounter things that fall from the sky ...... or encounter attacks from unsuspecting people ...... or face moments when you must make difficult decisions ......\n( --How will you choose?)
建筑交互=Architectural Interaction
大地图引导3=Large map guide 3
在一些节点上将会生成各式建筑与地区，其中有的建筑会出售商品，有的建筑会对这个世界产生影响，而一些地区将会提供一片供你探索的场景，里面丰厚的奖励在等着你……\n（——请多去探究它们的作用，说不定对你有帮助）=Various buildings and areas will be created at some nodes, some of which will sell goods, some of which will have an impact on the world, and some areas will provide a scene for you to explore, with great rewards waiting for you ......\n(-- (Please explore them more, they may be helpful to you)
风物志=Landscape
记载了太初世界各种信息的书籍，能够从这里查到NPC信息、材料的来源、功法种类与灵宠种类。\n（——当你对材料跟突破感到迷茫时，不妨看一下风物志）=A book with all kinds of information about the world of the beginning of time. You are able to find out NPC information, sources of materials, types of feats and types of spirit pets from here. \n (--when you feel confused about materials and breakthroughs, you may want to read the wind and the world)
灵宠=Spiritual Pet
击杀怪物后将会在风物志处解锁灵宠图鉴。（只有金丹期以上才能使用）=After killing the monster, you will unlock the Spiritual Pet icon at the Windy World. (Only available at Jindan stage or above)
门派交互教学=Sect Interaction Teaching
门派交互=Sect Interaction
门派交互引导=Sect interaction guide
地图上分布着许许多多的门派，在其他门派处可以进行商品交易和建立对双方都有好处的外交关系\n不同门派的发展方针不同，他们与你或许会发展成竞争关系，你可以选择摧毁他们，以确保你的门派能够更加顺利的发展。=There are many sects spread out on the map, and at other sects you can trade goods and establish diplomatic relations that are beneficial to both sides \n different sects have different development policies, and they may develop a competitive relationship with you, and you can choose to destroy them to ensure that your sect can develop more smoothly.
门派任务教学=Sect task teaching
建筑门派=Architectural Sects
任务=Mission
门派任务引导=Sect task guide
门派会定期发布一些任务，接取并完成可以得到一定的酬劳。\n（此举能够提升该门派对你的好感，请善加利用！）=The sect will periodically release some tasks, take and complete them to get a certain amount of reward. \n (This action can improve the goodwill of the sect to you, please make good use of it!)
互易教学=Interactive Teaching
互易引导=Mutual Ease Guidance
也许这里会有你需要的东西，只要你带上足够的金钱，你就能买到你想要的\n（——前提是你与该门派没有处在敌对关系）=Maybe there will be something you need here, as long as you bring enough money, you can buy what you want \n (- provided you are not in a hostile relationship with the faction)
门派外交教学=School diplomacy teaching
门派外交引导=Sect Diplomacy Guide
在此处与该门派洽谈外交事务，你可以选择强硬亦可以选择温和，也许能够获得意想不到的益处。=Here you can negotiate diplomatic matters with the sect, you can choose to be tough or gentle, and you may get unexpected benefits.
门派进攻教学=Sect attack teaching
进攻=Offense
门派进攻引导=Sect attack guide
你已经容忍不了这个门派的存在了！在此处对该门派宣战并进入门派战，与他们来一场生死对决。\n（——去取得胜利，然后摧毁它吧！）=You can no longer tolerate the existence of this sect! Declare war on this sect here and enter the sect war for a life and death duel with them. \n (- Go get the victory and destroy it!)
城市交互教学=Urban Interactive Teaching
建筑城市=Architecture City
聚落交互=Colony Interaction
城市交互引导=City Interactive Guide
地图上分布大大小小的聚落，不同规模的聚落人口数量以及贩售的商品不同\n聚落等级分为村落、城池、国家（部落）\n你可以通过功能入口进行拜访npc、商品购买、聚落庇护等一系列操作……=There are large and small settlements distributed on the map, and the number of people and goods sold in different size settlements are different \n the level of settlements are divided into villages, cities, countries (tribes)\n you can visit npc, goods purchase, settlement shelter and a series of operations through the functional entrance ......
城市任务教学=Urban Mission Teaching
城市任务引导=City Mission Guide
聚落会定期发布一些任务，接取并完成可以得到一定的酬劳。\n（此举能够提升该城市对你的好感，请善加利用！）=The colony will periodically release some quests, and you can get a certain amount of reward for taking and completing them. \n (This action can improve the goodwill of that city to you, please make good use of it!)
城市事件教学=Teaching Urban Events
城市事件引导=City Event Guide
天灾、妖祸、邪修入侵，灾难使得城市人心惶惶，人口不断下降……当他们的人口降为0，那么他们将永远消失。\n如果你帮助聚落解决事件，可能会提升该城市对你的好感或是得到一些意外收获。\n（——福兮祸所依，祸兮福所伏，并非每个事件都会是坏事）=Natural disasters, demonic scourges, evil cultivators invasion, disasters make the city fearful and the population keeps dropping ...... When their population drops to 0, then they will disappear forever. \nIf you help the colony to solve the incident, you may improve the city's goodwill towards you or get some unexpected harvest. \n (-fortunately, not every event will be a bad one)
城市庇护教学=Urban shelter teaching
城市庇护引导=Urban shelter guidance
天灾与修士的恶意，羸弱的凡人常常因此招致毁灭。\n当你在该聚落取得足够的好感后，可以在此处许诺庇护，他们将定期供奉你。\n（——庇护之后的城市将会产出门派气运，如有需要，请多多完成它）=The malice of natural disasters and monks, weak mortals often incur destruction as a result. \nWhen you have gained enough goodwill in that colony, you can promise asylum here and they will make regular offerings to you. \n (- the city after the asylum will yield sect qi, if needed, please complete it more often)
城市摧毁教学=City Destruction Teaching
城市摧毁引导=City destruction guide
你已经容忍不了这个聚落的存在了！从此处进入可摧毁它。\n但你要小心它的庇护者，如果贸然攻击你将会遭到他们的反击\n（——不是每个聚落都拥有庇护者）=You can no longer tolerate the existence of this colony! You can destroy it by entering from here. \n But you have to be careful of its patrons, if you attack rashly you will be attacked by them back \n (- not every colony has patrons)
探索点内部教学=Exploration point internal teaching
探索点交互=Explore Point Interaction
未知区域=Unknown area
探索点引导1=Discovery Point Guide 1
一片未知的地域，运用你一切智慧与法术探索这里吧！\n点击左键移动到一块块的小区域进行探索，一些区域可能存在封印或者不利地形……\n -封印-需要一定法术去攻破，否则便无法探索\n -区域效果-会对你的小队产生一些负面效果\n -搜寻&互动物品-在区域的四个角落有可能产生可互动物品，通过一些法宝或者消耗道具来获得一些物品，当然有些时候你甚至不用付出任何代价……=An unknown area, use all your wisdom and spells to explore it! \n Click the left button to move to a small area to explore, some areas may have seals or unfavorable terrain ......\n - Seals - require certain spells to break, otherwise you will not be able to explore \n - Area effects - will have some negative effects on your team \n - Search & interactive items - in the four corners of the area there may be interactive items. There is a possibility of interactive items in the four corners of the area, through some magic or consume props to get some items, of course, some times you do not even have to pay any price ......
探索点交互教学=Explore Point Interactive Teaching
探索技能&探索法宝=Exploration skills & Exploration magic treasure
探索点引导2=Discovery Point Guide 2
运用好你的法术与法宝，会让这趟探索之旅事半功倍。=Use your spells and spells well, will make this trip to explore twice as much work.
探索成功=Explore Success
探索点引导3=Discovery Point Guide 3
你已经成功探索此处，满载收获的你可以在结算界面选择离开此地\n如果你仍然感到不满足的话可以选择留在这片地域里游荡，也许你还遗漏了什么地方也说不定\n（——不过等你厌倦了，记得通过右下角的离开按钮离开此地）=You have successfully explored this place, full of harvest you can choose to leave this place in the settlement interface \n If you still feel unsatisfied, you can choose to stay in this area wandering, maybe you also missed something may be \n (- but when you are tired of it, remember to leave this place through the bottom right corner of the leave button)

乐器=Musical Instrument
笛=Flute
特色闭口吹奏乐器，音色朴拙抱素独为地籁。=The characteristic closed mouth wind instrument, the tone is simple and clumsy, holding the vegetation alone for the earth music.
太初广为流传的吹奏乐器，用竹子制作而成，音色婉转、清澈。=A wind instrument that was widely played in the beginning of time, made of bamboo, with a gentle, clear tone.

琴=Piano
一种拨弦乐器，音色深沉、余音悠远。=A plucked string instrument with a deep tone and a long after-tone.
传说是一位神女使过的古琴，琴音能够涤荡人心。=Legend has it that it is an ancient zither used by a goddess, and the sound of the zither can cleanse the heart.
九黎部落用来盛酒的容器，圆口方体，气度深厚雄健、仿佛大器。=The vessel used by the Jiu Li tribe to hold wine, with a round mouth and square body, is profound and robust, as if it were a large vessel.
浅而敞口的盛物器，上面有燧人氏族独有的花纹，不少人追捧它的华丽。=A shallow and open-mouthed receptacle with a floral pattern unique to the Flint clan, many people sought after its splendor.
描绘了妖后羲和设夜宴载歌载行的场面，线条遒劲流畅、工整精细，彷佛要将人吸进画中。=It depicts the scene of the demon queen, Xixi, holding a night banquet with songs and walking, with strong and smooth lines, neat and fine, as if to absorb people into the painting.
描绘了妖皇帝俊统领群妖巡视天地的场面，群龙拉辇，遮天蔽日，声势浩大。=It depicts the scene of the demon emperor Jun leading the group of demons to patrol the heaven and earth, the group of dragons pulling the carriage, covering the sky, the sound is huge.
刻着龙凤团的大型玉佩，龙飞凤舞、华丽异常，甚至能感受到灵气在上面跳动。=Large jade pendant engraved with dragon and phoenix regiment, dragon flying and phoenix dancing, gorgeous and unusual, even can feel the aura pulsating on it.
刻着麒麟团的装饰玉佩，想必用来驱邪避凶或是镇宅也是极好的。=The decorative jade pendant engraved with a unicorn group must be used to ward off evil spirits or to calm the house is also very good.
轻盈飘逸，裙裾灵动，转动起来仿佛阵阵涟漪，深受女性修士的追捧。=Light and airy, the train is moving, turning as if a ripple, and is highly sought after by female cultivators.

使用后能以雷神敕令唤来微弱的雷电，用雷电之力轰击敌方角色，对其造成60%阳属性伤害。\n（福生玄黄天尊，急急如律令——！）=When used, it can summon a weak thunderbolt with the Edict of the Thunder God and blast enemy characters with the power of thunderbolt, dealing 60% Yang attribute damage to them. \n (Fusheng Xuanhuang Tianzun, Urgent Order--!)

催动符箓禁锢角色，使敌方角色4s内无法移动。\n（口念法诀、脚踩七星——！）=Press the talisman to imprison the character and make the enemy character unable to move for 4s. \n (Mouth the spell, foot on the seven stars--!)

使用后能以雷神敕令唤来粗壮的雷电，用雷电之力轰击敌方角色。\n（福生玄黄天尊，急急如律令——！）=When used, it can summon thick thunderbolts with the Edict of the Thunder God and blast the enemy character with the power of thunderbolts. \n (Fusheng Xuanhuang Tianzun, Urgent Order--!)
使用后能召唤出一条电蛇鞭打敌方角色。=When used, it can summon an electric snake to whip the enemy character.
将雨露灵气封印于符中，使用后能够暂时影响自然法则，将天气变为大雨。=Sealing rain and dew aura in the talisman, it can temporarily affect the laws of nature and change the weather to heavy rain after use.
焚烧后能祈祷使用雷电言灵，唤来一道微弱电流入侵敌方角色的经脉。=After burning, you can pray to use the lightning speech spirit to call a weak electric current to invade the enemy character's meridian.
焚烧后能以雷神敕令唤来群雷，群雷在指定3m范围内狂舞轰炸所有角色。=After burning, it can call for a group of thunderbolts by the Edict of the Thunder God, which will dance wildly and bombard all characters within a specified 3m range.
将大量雷电言灵画入符中的符箓，使用后能够连续召唤闪电，轰击场上所有敌人。=A talisman in which a large number of lightning spirits are drawn into the talisman, and when used, it can summon lightning in succession to blast all enemies on the field.
使用后能够唤来一道明亮的电蛇雷锥穿透敌人。=When used, it can conjure up a bright cone of electric snakes and thunder to penetrate the enemy.
将符箓中的雷电力量引入双脚，瞬移至指定位置，并对周围10m范围内的所有角色造成伤害。=Introduce the lightning power from the talisman into both feet, instantly move to the specified location and deal damage to all characters within 10m of the surrounding area.
封印特殊雷电的符箓，使用后能将雷电接化在双手中，用玄妙的发力技巧让双臂快速鞭打敌方角色5次。=A talisman that seals a special lightning bolt. When used, the talisman transforms the lightning bolt into your hands and allows your arms to quickly whip the enemy character 5 times with a subtle power technique.
使用后能够唤来一道特定轨迹、穿透性更强的电蛇雷锥。=When used, it can conjure up a specific trajectory and a more penetrating electric snake cone of lightning.
焚烧后能敕令雷电言灵，唤来一道粗壮电流入侵敌方角色的经脉，对敌方角色造成伤害。=When burned, it can command a thunderbolt spirit to invade the enemy's meridian with a thick electric current, causing damage to the enemy character.
使用后能够沟通天地法则，召唤混沌神雷轰击范围内的敌方角色。=When used, it can communicate with the laws of heaven and earth and summon Chaos God Thunder to blast enemy characters within range.
使用后能够沟通天地法则，唤来阴雷轰炸范围内的所有角色。=When used, it can communicate with the laws of heaven and earth and call upon all characters within the bombardment range of Yin Thunder.
使用后瞬移至指定位置，并产生「雷云」。=When used, it instantly moves to a designated location and creates a "thunder cloud".
药草=Herbs
普通材料=General Materials
山中常见的草药，有补血效之效。=A common herb in the mountains, it has the effect of tonic blood.
山中常见的草药，有舒筋活络之效。=A common herb in the mountains, it has a soothing effect.
林中干燥的块茎，有息风止痉之效。=The dried tubers of the forest have a wind-relieving and antispasmodic effect.
灵植=spiritual plant
蕴含些许金灵炁的小草。=A small grass that contains some golden spirit air.

清晨的花露精华。=Early morning flower dew essence.

精制的蚕丝，十斤生丝里才能制出一斤精蚕丝。=Refined silk, ten pounds of raw silk in order to make a pound of fine silk.

天蚕结茧时分泌的丝液凝固而成的线。=The silk liquid secreted by the silkworm during cocooning solidifies into a thread.

其貌不扬的小草，蕴含着大道法则。=The small, unattractive grass contains the laws of the Great Way.
突破材料。=Breakthrough material.

精气=Essence
妖兽修炼出的精气，如米粒般大小，飘渺分散。=The essence cultivated by the demon beast is as big as a grain of rice and drifting and scattered.
怪物通用掉落=Monster generic drop

阴之精粹=Essence of Yin

如同人发一般的发须，握在手中能够平复人的情绪。=The hair is like human hair, and when held in the hand, it can calm people's emotions.

普通妖怪的其中一缕魂魄，虽然微弱，但是亦有妙用。=One of the wisps of the soul of an ordinary demon, although weak, but also has a wonderful use.

盖身不动，精固而水朝元；心不动，则气固而火朝元；真性寂，则魂藏而木朝元；妄情忘，则魄伏而金藏元；四大安和，则意定而土朝元。=If the body does not move, the essence will be solid and the water will face the yuan; if the mind does not move, the gas will be solid and the fire will face the yuan; if the true nature is silent, the soul will be hidden and the wood will face the yuan; if the delusional feelings are forgotten, the body will be ambushed and the gold will face the yuan; if the four major peace will be fixed and the earth will face the yuan.

术法2阶道术火1=Technique 2 stage Daoist fire 1
修士们在火系道术上的进一步钻研，最先的那些修士因此得到了有别于他人力量与地位，此后对火灵力的钻研日益加深。=Cultivators in the fire dao art of further study, the first of those cultivators thus received a distinctive power and status, and thereafter the fire spiritual power of the study of deepening.
钻研术法的修士，在丙火之力的基础上发现了更有效率的运行路径，从而演生出来了新功法。=Cultivators who studied the art discovered a more efficient path of operation based on the power of C fire, thus evolving new gong methods.
蕴含烈阳之力的术法，甚至能将大地烤焦。=The spells that contain the power of the blazing sun can even scorch the earth.
术法3阶道术火1=Technique 3 stage Daoist fire 1
一名惊才绝艳的修士在尝试将不同火焰融合时，创造出了不稳定的道术。=An amazingly talented cultivator creates unstable dao techniques while trying to fuse different flames.
传承已久的术法，能将离火之力炼化三次增强其威力。可即便是现在，一般的修士还是接触不到。=The long-heralded technique can refine the power of the iatrogenic fire three times to enhance its power. But even now, ordinary cultivators still can't touch it.
术法4阶道术火1=Technique 4 stage Daoist fire 1
九幽里终年不息的火焰，曾被用来惩治恶徒或是犯错的弟子，在灼烧之痛与憎恶之情煎熬下的囚徒于某夜创下了这门术法，得以逃脱牢笼。=The flames of the Nine Underworlds, which never end, have been used to punish villains or errant disciples, and prisoners tormented by the pain of burning and hatred created this technique one night to escape their cages.
通过神秘仪式使失传的归虚神火降临，毁天灭地的力量终重回现世，这究竟是恩赐？还是诅咒？。=The mysterious ritual brought down the lost fire of the Return of the Void, and the power to destroy the heavens and the earth finally returned to the present world. Or is it a curse?
术法5阶道术火1=Technique 5 order Daoist fire 1
三昧乃四静虑、八解脱以外之一切定。又言无漏之空、无相、无愿三昧为“三解脱门”，有觉有观定、无觉有观定、无觉无观定为“三昧”。=Samadhi is all the other than the four meditations and the eight liberations. It is also said that the three samadhis of emptiness, no appearance, and no wish are the "three liberation doors", and that there are "samadhis" of awareness and observation, no awareness and observation, and no awareness and observation.
术法5阶道术火2=Technique 5 order Daoist fire 2

术法1阶道术水1=Technique 1 stage Daoist water 1

昆仑的苦修士创造的、还结冰刃的术法，其威力曾经站在时代前列。=The power of the spells created by the ascetics of Kunlun, who also knotted ice blades, used to stand at the forefront of the times.

术法3阶道术水1=Technique 3 stage Daoist water 1

术法4阶道术水1=Technique 4 stage Daoist water 1

古时某大能在炽热绝境之中领悟的功法，传说修炼到极致能改变一方天地的气象的威能=In ancient times, a great power in the heat of the extreme realm of comprehension of the technique, the legendary cultivation to the extreme can change the power of the weather of the world
术法5阶道术水1=Technique 5 order Daoist water 1

术法5阶道术水2=Technique 5 order Daoist water 2

术法5阶道术水3=Technique 5 order Daoist water 3

术法1阶道术木1=Technique 1 stage Daoist wood 1
记载了功与防的术法，古西州的修士们共同创造的秘法，随着时间的推移，便不再是秘密。=The secret techniques of Kung Fu and defense, which were created by the cultivators of the ancient western states together, are no longer a secret as time goes by.
古西州一位修士发誓要为苍生祛除所有病痛、穷尽一声创造出的功法，虽对多种病痛有奇效，但人们的痛苦并未因此消失。=A monk in the ancient western state vowed to rid the people of all illnesses and pains, and created a gong method with an exhaustive bang, which had miraculous effects on a variety of illnesses and pains, but people's suffering did not disappear as a result.
术法2阶道术木1=Technique 2 stage Daoist wood 1
记载了敕令百花的术法，能在短时间炼化出大量的木灵力。=It is recorded that the technique of Edict of Hundred Flowers can refine a large amount of wood spirit power in a short period of time.
灵力灌注后坚硬如铁，摘花飞叶皆可伤人。=Spiritual power infused with hard as iron, picking flowers and flying leaves can hurt people.
术法3阶道术木1=Technique 3 order Daoist wood 1
记载了驱使花灵的手段，上古有花灵者秉灵炁所生，飞舞于天地间，使得诸多玄妙术法。而后有修士大肆将其炼制成杀敌的法宝，整个族群差点因此消失。=Recorded the means to drive the flower spirit, in ancient times there are flower spirit Bing spiritual air born, flying in the world, making many subtle techniques. And then there are cultivators will be a lot of refining it into the enemy's magic treasure, the whole community almost disappeared as a result.

初级层次的扮演，得到血神的注视，以20%生命值为代价，换取自身一级属性面板将叠加「血神」一级属性面板的（魅力*0.2)%，持续（3+魅力*0.3)s，部分技能获得强化。\n（可能导致角色死亡）=Primary level play, get the gaze of the blood god, at the cost of 20% life value, in exchange for their own level one attribute panel will be stacked with "blood god" level one attribute panel of (charisma * 0.2)%, lasting (3 + charisma * 0.3)s, some skills get strengthened. \n (may lead to the death of the character)
阴光圈=Shaded Aperture

附身-血神=Possession - Blood God

血之回响=Echoes of Blood

After winning a battle you can reshape your flesh to a certain extent and no longer suffer from the effects of a major metamorphosis and internal injuries. (Passive skill)

血蛊摄心·迅*=Blood Compulsion Heart-Quick*

生在商贾之家的你，天生就有着对钱财的渴望。年幼时的一场大病使得家中长辈将你送入云梦寻仙问道，此后你便再也没能见到过父母。寒来暑往，皓首穷经。随着年龄的增长，你不禁思考：苦修？炼丹？画符？三千大道，有几条可以修得真仙？既然大道飘渺，为何不从心而行？于是你决心证一条红尘「商道」，抱着这样的决心，你遇到了一位老人……=Born in a merchant family, you were born with a desire for money. A serious illness at a young age made the elders of the family send you to the cloud dream to seek immortality, after which you never saw your parents again. After that, you never saw your parents again. As you grow older, you can't help but think: asceticism? Alchemy? Draw talisman? How many of the three thousand paths can be cultivated to achieve true immortality? Since the great path is so remote, why don't you do it from your heart? So you are determined to prove a red earth "business path", with this determination, you met an old man ......

仿照前古遗珍炼制的法宝，对法术有较好的加成效果，但价格高昂，让一般修士望而却步。=Imitation of the former ancient treasures refined magic treasures, a better additive effect on spells, but the high price, so that the average cultivator discouraged.

镶嵌着昂贵宝石的戒指，性能可观，重要的是冬暖夏凉。=Rings set with expensive stones have considerable performance and, importantly, are warm in winter and cool in summer.
使用甄稀钢材，仿照上古宝剑炼制而成，微一舞动，青芒立似灵蛇吐信，闪烁不停。=The use of rare steel, imitating the ancient treasure sword refining, a slight dance, the green mane immediately like a spiritual snake spitting, flashing.
使用甄稀钢材，仿照古刀炼制而成，完全放弃了防御，保留了极致的攻击。=Using Zhen rare steel, it is refined after the ancient sword, completely abandoning defense and retaining the ultimate attack.
只有出色的工匠才能打造出的长枪，造价不菲，攻守兼备。=Only an outstanding craftsman can create a lance that costs a lot of money and is both offensive and defensive.
加持青索之力的拂尘，哪怕是出色的工匠，也得费尽心力才能打造而成。=The duster that is enriched with the power of Blue Split will take a lot of effort to create, even for an outstanding craftsman.
加持着青索灵力的长袍，裁剪舒适，防御力可观，重要的是能防住微小水滴的飞溅。=The robe, enriched with the spiritual power of the Blue Split, is comfortably cut, has considerable defensive power and, importantly, protects against the splash of tiny drops of water.
镶嵌着昂贵宝石的戒指，造价可不便宜。=Rings with expensive stones are not cheap to make.
上古遗珍，使用大量天材地宝炼制的宝剑，剑芒之下，妖魔无存。=Ancient relics, using a large number of heavenly treasures refined sword, under the sword, demons do not exist.
上古遗珍，使用大量天材地宝炼制的刀，血肉在此刀面前不值一提。=Ancient relics, using a large number of heavenly treasures to refine the knife, blood and flesh in front of this knife is not worth mentioning.
上古遗珍，纵然是最出色的工匠也难以打造的长枪，哪怕看一眼，都将被其锋芒震慑。=Ancient relics, even the most outstanding craftsmen are difficult to create the lance, even a glance, will be shocked by its sharpness.
上古遗留的拂尘，开辟了特殊的纹路，优化了灵力输入的能力，谷神不死，是谓玄牝。=The ancient legacy of the duster, opened up a special pattern, optimizing the ability to input spiritual energy, the god of the valley is immortal, is called the Xuanma.
纹绣着小型阵法、拥有金色纹路的长袍，富贵气息迎面而来。=Embroidered with small formations, has a golden pattern of robes, rich and noble atmosphere to welcome.
刻画了小型阵法的戒指，需要炼制者精雕细琢，可谓是匠人精神。=Rings that are engraved with small formations require the refiner to be meticulously crafted and can be described as artisanal.
在北斗七星环列的七个池中炼制而成，俯视器身，如同登高山而下望深渊，飘渺而深邃仿佛有巨龙盤卧。=It is made in the seven pools surrounded by the seven stars of the Big Dipper. Looking down at the body of the vessel, it is like climbing a high mountain and looking down into the abyss, as if there is a giant dragon lying in the air.
在北斗七星环列的七个池中炼制而成，刀身有七星，可开天辟地，乃杀戮之刃。=Refined in the seven pools ringed by the seven stars of the Big Dipper, the blade has seven stars that can open up the sky and the earth, and is the killing blade.
在北斗七星环列的七个池中炼制而成的长枪，拥有着来自群星的“祝福”，持有者偶尔会听见朦胧的低语。=The lance, made in the seven pools of the Big Dipper, has a "blessing" from the stars, and the bearer occasionally hears a hazy whisper.
