绝仙剑·后天=Absolute Immortal Sword - Late Stage
绝仙剑·先天=Sword of the Absolute Immortal - Early Stage
先天至宝之一，传说天地浑沌之初，盘古借助此斧劈开天地，一日九变，形成如今的世界，此斧拥有分开天地、穿梭太虚之力。=One of the supreme treasures, the legend says that at the beginning of the chaos of heaven and earth, Pan Gu used this axe to split the heaven and earth, nine changes a day, forming the world today, this axe has the power to separate the heaven and earth, shuttle the power of the void.
西方二圣教主准提道人以其本体西方庚金菩提结合金、银、琉璃等七宝炼制而成，号称无物不刷。=Western two saints sect leader paramount to its body Western Geng Jin Bodhi combined with gold, silver, glaze and other seven treasures refined, known as nothing to Wand.
先天至宝之一，盘古幡拥有撕裂鸿蒙混沌之威、粉碎诸天时空之力、造化无极之道、统御万法奥义之功、开辟天地寰宇之能。=One of the supreme treasures, the Pan Gu streamer has the power to tear apart the chaos, shatter the power of space and time, the way of creation, the power to unify the mysteries of all laws, and the ability to open up the world.
先天至宝之一，钟体外日月星辰、地水火风环绕其上，钟体内有山川大地、洪荒万族隐现其中，拥有镇压「鸿蒙世界」之威、扭转「诸天时空」之力、演变「天道玄机」之功、炼化「地水火风」之能。=It is one of the supreme treasures of the Heaven, surrounded by the sun, moon, stars, earth, water, fire and wind, with mountains, rivers, earth, and tribes of the Flood hidden within its body, and possessing the power to suppress the "world of Hongmeng", reverse the power of "space-time", evolve the power of "heavenly mysteries", and refine the power of "earth, water, fire and wind".
先天至宝之一，此宝带身上可以护体，万法不侵。=One of the prime treasures, this treasure with the body can protect the body, all the law does not invade.
取首山之铁，使用混沌凶兽的怨念锤炼而成的魔刀，漆黑如墨，一面刻画深渊血海的恐怖景象，一面刻画破碎战场的残阳。其内蕴藏无穷之力，为杀戮至宝。=Take the iron of the first mountain, using the chaotic beast's resentment hammered into the magic knife, black as ink, one side engraved with the terrifying scene of the abyssal sea of blood, the other side engraved with the broken battlefield of the waning sun. It contains infinite power and is Supreme Treasure treasure for killing.
剑身一面刻日月星辰，一面刻山川草木。剑柄一面书农耕畜养之术，一面书四海一统之策。其内蕴藏无穷之力，为斩妖除魔的神剑。=The sword is engraved with the sun, moon and stars on one side, and the mountains, rivers and grasses on the other. The hilt of the sword is written on one side with the art of farming and animal husbandry, and on the other side with the strategy of unification of the four seas. It contains infinite power and is a divine sword for cutting down demons and eliminating devils.
太古龙族的蓄水至宝，经过了亘古岁月的消磨，虽说它已经失去原来的光华，但依旧无人敢轻试其威。=The ancient dragon clan's water storage treasure, after the wear and tear of the eternal ages, although it has lost its original glory, but still no one dares to lightly test its power.
以七七四十九种毒物辅佐炼制，从毒物池取出的一刻毒气冲天，上面占满见血封喉的剧毒，沾之则死。=With seventy-seven forty-nine kinds of poisonous substances to supplement the refining, from the poison pool out of the moment the poisonous gas rushed to the sky, the above accounted for the blood-sealed throat of the poison, touching it will die.
携带者据说不会惧怕一般的火焰=Carriers are said not to be afraid of ordinary fire
雷泽某位天神创作，记载了流传于世的至理。——“八卦之象，申而用之。”=A certain celestial god of Leizawa composed and recorded the supreme truth that has been handed down to the world. -- "The eight signs of the trigrams, Shen and use them."
出自上古大能的法宝，能够御使雨水，隐隐触碰到了世界的本源法则。=From the ancient great treasure, able to imperial rain, vaguely touched the original law of the world.
出自上古大能的法宝，能够御使狂风，隐隐触碰到了世界的本源法则。=The magic treasure from the ancient great powers, able to control the gale, vaguely touching the original law of the world.
轩辕氏族某位先祖炼制的灵幡，曾在氏族之战中发挥重要的作用。=The spirit streamer made by a certain ancestor of the Xuan Yuan clan had played an important role in the battle of the clans.
无名巨兽的骨头，在一次偶然的机会中被常先获得，然后炼制成了法宝。=The bones of the nameless giant beast were obtained by Chang Xian in a chance encounter and then refined into a magic treasure.
蚩尤氏族研究设计出来的利刃，曾在氏族之战中发挥重要的作用。=The Chi clan researched and designed the sharp blade, which had played an important role in the clan's battle.
无名英灵的法宝，被力牧在一处幽深的山洞中获得，因为破损严重，后来请了名师重铸。=The magic treasure of the nameless Yingling was obtained by Li Mu in a deep cave, and because it was badly broken, a famous master was later asked to recast it.
无支祈的法宝，似乎从它诞生之初就一直伴随左右，起初是粗糙的陨铁棍，随着主人的使用渐渐地变成了主人期待的模样。=Wu Zhi Pray's magic treasure, which seems to have been with it since the beginning of its birth, started out as a rough meteorite iron stick and gradually became what the owner expected as he used it.
饱饮鲜血的战斧，伴随着刑天杀敌无数，浓重的血腥煞气会让境界低下之人失去理智，成为只知道杀戮的野兽。=The blood-soaked battle axe, accompanied by Interceptor kill countless enemies, the heavy blood fury will make people of low realm lose their minds and become beasts that only know how to kill.
铭刻了聚集土灵力的法阵，能够以轻巧的力道挖开了坚硬的土块。=Inscribed with a spell formation that gathers earth spiritual power, it was able to dig through the hard earth with a light force.
蕴含浓郁木灵力的铲，能够在挖过的土壤中留下木灵力，在别的地方也许会有妙用。=The shovel containing the rich wood spirit power can leave wood spirit power in the dug soil, which may be of wonderful use elsewhere.
杖=cane
仓颉为改良文字，曾拄着它走遍各境，因此也沾染了各境的灵炁。=In order to improve the writing, Cang Jie used to travel all over the realm with it, so he was also tainted with the spiritual air of each realm.

每1s产生一个着火地表=Generate one fire surface every 1s
每1s产生四个着火地表=Generate four fires per 1s on the surface
无特殊效果=No special effects
每1s产生一个地上雾=Produces a ground fog every 1s
每1s产生一个积水地表=Generate a ponding surface every 1s
每1s产生四个积水地表=Generate four ponding surfaces every 1s
每1s产生一个结冰地表=Generate a frozen surface every 1s
每1s产生四个结冰地表=Four iced surfaces are generated every 1s
每5s随机轰击20个地块，对其上角色造成少量冰属性伤害，并产生结冰地表=Randomly blasts 20 blocks every 5s, dealing a small amount of ice damage to characters on them and creating a frozen ground
每1s产生一个地上效果罡风（进入的角色将被眩晕，持续造成20%倍率混元伤害）=Every 1s to generate a ground effect astral wind (the character entering will be stunned and continue to deal 20% multiplier hybrid damage)
每1s轰击四个地块，造成巨额雷属性伤害，并产生一个地上效果雷云（雷云内的角色受到感电，阳属性抗性-30）=Every 1s blast four plots of land, causing huge lightning damage and generating a ground effect thundercloud (characters within the thundercloud are subjected to sensory electricity and Yang resistance -30)
每1s产生一个地上效果毒瘴\n(毒瘴为内单位附加剧毒入侵，每秒受到总血量5%的阴属性真实伤害)=Every 1s to produce a ground effect toxic miasma \n (toxic miasma for the internal units attached to the poisonous invasion, the total amount of blood per second by 5% of the Yin attribute real damage)
所有角色内心受到影响，每秒产生一次【狐火】=All characters are affected internally and generate [Foxfire] once per second
心法1阶炼体技1=Mind 1 stage refining technique 1
体修的入门心法之一，记载了淬炼骨肉的法门，修炼后使周身骨肉无时不刻吸收微小灵炁。=It is one of the introductory techniques for body cultivation, which is a method for refining the flesh and bones, so that the flesh and bones around the body can absorb tiny spiritual air all the time.
体修的入门心法之一，记载了贯通筋膜的法门，可短暂地使筋膜移位，灵力周转更加顺畅。=One of the introductory mind techniques for body cultivation, it records the method of penetrating the fascia, which can briefly shift the fascia for a smoother spiritual energy turnover.
体修的入门心法之一，记载了横炼锻皮的法门，传闻有人醉心研究此心法，最终臻于化境，刀枪不入。=One of the introductory mind techniques of physical cultivation, recorded the method of cross-refining forging skin, rumor has it that some people have studied this mind technique so intensely that they eventually reached the realm of transformation, and the sword and spear are invincible.
心法2阶炼体技1=Mind 2 stage refining technique 1
记载了通脉的心法，炼至最高境界可连络周身、通行血气，从此在崎岖山路也可健步如飞。=It is written that the heart method of the blood vessels can be connected to the body and blood energy at the highest level, so that you can walk like flying on the rugged mountains.
在修行界流传甚广的洗经伐髓的法门，有脱胎换骨之效。=In the cultivation world widely circulated in the method of cleansing the meridian and eliminating the marrow, with the effect of shedding the bone.
五行流派体修创建的心法，根据「木肝」、「火心」、「土脾」、「金肺」的理念，引五行灵炁入体以炼脏。=The Five Elements School of Body Cultivation creates a heart method based on the concept of "Wood Liver", "Fire Heart", "Earth Spleen" and "Gold Lung", which draws the five elements of spiritual air into the body to refine the organs.
心法3阶炼体技1=Mind 3 stage refining technique 1
偶然在地煞之力中生还的修士，用毕生的时间写下这部功法。引地煞之力入体，期间运转玄功打熬身体，锻炼皮肉，功成可使皮肉坚如金石。=A practitioner who survived the Earth's Destructive Force by chance spent his life writing this technique. The earth-destroying power is introduced into the body, during which the body is toughened and the flesh is exercised by running the Xuan Gong, which makes the flesh as hard as gold and stone.
上古有门派名为「大藏」，在坠星之战中消亡，其传承功法亦散佚，后来者收集残页断章，推演数年得「大藏玄功」。=In the ancient times, there was a sect named "Da Zang", which died in the Battle of the Falling Stars, and its inherited techniques were also scattered, and later people collected the scraps of pages and chapters and deduced "Da Zang Xuan Gong" for several years.
诸有漏识，于现法中，毕竟灭尽，故名寂灭。=All the knowledge that is available is extinguished after all in the present dharma, so it is called silence.
心法4阶炼体技1=Mind 4 refining techniques 1
追求力量的炼体修士再也不满足以地煞捶打身体，于是采取了更极端的方式，他们引天罡之力入体，锤炼五脏六腑，从此全身再无死门。=The pursuit of power refinement practitioners are no longer satisfied with the body pounded by the earth brakes, so they take a more extreme way, they lead the power of the Big Dipper into the body, hammering the internal organs, from then on the whole body no more dead doors.
理绝众相，故名无相。=The reason for this is the absence of all appearances.
一名远古至尊潜修研习数十年所创之功法，修炼者可糅合阴阳五行之力，炼化出更高层次的灵炁。=An ancient supreme being has been studying and researching for decades to create a technique that allows the practitioner to combine the forces of yin and yang to refine a higher level of spiritual air.
心法5阶炼体技1=Mind 5 refining techniques 1
包含诸多炼体法诀的心法，包含了龙象之力和云雷之力运转的规则。传说修炼到最高境界可超越肉身的极限，翻手覆掌之间可动风云、惊雷鸣，破碎虚空。=The heart method containing many body refining techniques contains the rules for the operation of the power of dragon and elephant and the power of clouds and thunder. Legend has it that cultivation to the highest level can transcend the limits of the physical body, between the flip of the hand and the palm can move the wind and clouds, thunder, shattering the void.
镌刻在三万里海底的玄铁上的无名玄功，无人知晓其过去，亦无法预见其未来，传闻修习之人最后都踏上了逆天之路。=Engraved on the Xuan Iron at the bottom of 30,000 miles of sea, no one knows its past, nor can they foresee its future, and it is rumored that those who practice it end up on the road to heaven.
心法1阶炼体势1=Heart method 1 stage refining body potential 1
记载了鳞介水族之势的体修心法，乃是在海边生活的体修所领悟，其势若水，生生不息。=It is a record of the physical cultivation mind method of the scaled aquatic potential, which is comprehended by the physical cultivators living in the seashore, and its potential is like water, which is incessantly alive.
记载了惊鸟入林之势的体修心法，据传是一位上古大能在老林中修炼数十年所得，其势耳听六路，眼观八方，使人更容易从危险中逃脱。=It is said to be a physical training method that records the momentum of a frightened bird entering the forest. It is said to have been obtained by an ancient great man who practiced for decades in the old forest, and the momentum has the ear to hear the six directions and the eye to see the eight directions, making it easier for a person to escape from danger.
记载了虎豹猎杀之势的体修心法，陷阵之途，有死无生。=It records the physical cultivation heart method of the tiger and leopard hunting and killing momentum, the way of trapping, there is death and no life.
心法2阶炼体势1=Mind 2 stage refining body potential 1
记载了风起云涌之势的体修心法，一名云鹤化形的体修所创立的功法，似风般吹拂，像云般游动。=A physical cultivation heart method that records the momentum of wind and clouds. A physical cultivator in the form of a cloud crane created a technique that blows like the wind and swims like a cloud.
记载了奔流入海之势的体修心法，炼就万丈波澜中不改其心的心境。=It is a record of the physical cultivation of the momentum of running into the sea, refining the state of mind that does not change its heart in the midst of ten thousand waves.
记载了惊雷炸地之势的体修心法，调动全身灵力轰击各处经脉，拟出惊雷之势震慑对手。=It is a physical cultivation heart method that records the momentum of thunder and lightning, mobilizing the spiritual energy of the whole body to bombard all meridians, and preparing the momentum of thunder to shock the opponent.
心法3阶炼体势1=Mind 3 stage refining body potential 1
记载了游龙飞天之势的体修心法，婉婉然如游龙之升，臻于化境者可修炼出龙威。=The body cultivation mind method that records the momentum of the wandering dragon flying to the sky, Wan Wan Ran is like the rising of the wandering dragon, those who reach the realm of transformation can cultivate the dragon power.
记载了嵯月普照之势的体修心法，炼就月光银辉，徐徐其势，以映人心。=It records the physical cultivation of the Saga moon's universal power, refining the moon's silvery glow, and slowly reflecting its power to the heart.
记载了煌日普照之势的体修心法，炼就日光金辉，煌煌大日，照耀其敌，无所遁形。=It is a physical cultivation method that records the power of the brilliant sun, refining the golden glow of the daylight, the brilliant sun, shining on its enemies, with nothing to hide.
心法4阶炼体势1=Mind 4 stage refining body potential 1
天地之正中，虚悬一穴，开阖有时，动静自然。天地根之势，绵绵若存，用之不勤。=The center of heaven and earth, a point of virtual suspension, open and close at times, the movement of natural. The momentum of the root of heaven and earth, continuous if existing, with no diligence.
记载了各种形态之势的妙用，集百家之长，海纳百川，有容乃大。=It is a record of the wonderful use of various forms of potentials, gathering the strengths of a hundred schools of thought, the sea and the rivers, and there is tolerance.
谷神之动静，即玄牝之门也。玄牝之势，大道本源。=The movement of the gods of the valley, that is, the door of the mysterious mare. The potential of the Xuanmai, the original source of the great Tao.
心法5阶炼体势1=Mind 5 stage refining body potential 1
带着亘古洪荒的的气息，缠绕包围着法则之力，显露万象，是为开天之势。=With the breath of the ancient flood, entwined surrounded by the power of the law, revealing all the signs, is the momentum of the opening of the sky.
上穷碧落下黄泉，逍遥天地间。=The upper reaches of the blue and the lower reaches of the yellow spring, free between heaven and earth.
心法1阶巫祝血神1=Heart method 1 stage witch wish blood god 1
传承自远古血神的基础功法，据说修炼者将以自身鲜血为引，接受血神的祝福=The basic technique inherited from the ancient Blood God, it is said that the practitioner will use his own blood as a guide to receive the blessing of the Blood God
记录了数支怪异的舞蹈，传闻远古时期的修士用此舞蹈取悦血神以获得力量=Several strange dances are recorded, and it is said that monks in ancient times used this dance to please the blood gods to gain power
记载了古老的灵舞，可以与血神沟通，比炼炁之法出现得更早，在以前万年不变的重复生活中，保持住了人族传承的火种。=The ancient spirit dance is recorded, which can communicate with the blood gods, and appeared earlier than the method of refining air, keeping the fire of the human heritage alive in the previous ten thousand years of unchanging repetition.
心法2阶巫祝血神1=Heart method 2 stage witch wish blood god 1
记载了灵舞的详细动作，巫们在长期与血神沟通的岁月中，逐渐对修炼产生了更深刻的领悟。=The detailed movements of the Spirit Dance were recorded, and the witches gradually developed a deeper understanding of the practice during the long years of communicating with the Blood God.
古老祭司观摩血神残影编写的心诀，修炼者可凭此心诀，向血神祈求力量=The ancient priests observed the heart technique written by the remnants of the Blood God, with which the practitioner can pray to the Blood God for power
远古血神一派传承而下的初级心诀，记录着数个骇人听闻的仪式，修炼者被世人视为邪魔=The ancient Blood God faction inherited the primary heart technique, which recorded several appalling rituals, and the practitioners were regarded as evil demons by the world
心法3阶巫祝血神1=Heart method 3 stage witch wish blood god 1
记录着血神派系更深层次的心法，传闻修炼者已可与血神做到初步的沟通，获得血肉之力=It records the deeper heart method of the Blood God faction, and it is rumored that the practitioner can already achieve preliminary communication with the Blood God and obtain the power of flesh and blood
传承自血神一派的灵舞，拥有着更加鬼魅的力量，灵舞是取悦血神的方式，传闻修炼者可以此连接血神，引发短暂的神降=The Spirit Dance, inherited from the Blood God school, has a more ghostly power. The Spirit Dance is a way to please the Blood God, and it is rumored that practitioners can connect to the Blood God and trigger a brief divine descent
无数前人为了应对逐渐出现的呓语聚集在一起，撰写了关于血神通灵和己身心境的修炼之法。=Countless predecessors gathered in order to cope with the gradual emergence of ravings and wrote about the cultivation of the blood god psychic and their own state of mind.
心法4阶巫祝血神1=Heart method 4 stage witch wish blood god 1
呓语是血神的残念，血肉是献给血神的祭品，聆听呓语，献出血肉吧=Murmuring is the remnant of the blood god, flesh and blood is the sacrifice to the blood god, listen to the murmuring and offer the flesh and blood
某法力通天的祭司拓印血神残象编写而出的灵舞，听闻习得此法便能更高效的与血神沟通=A priest of great power to copy the blood god remnants of the preparation of the spiritual dance, I heard that the practice of this method will be able to communicate more efficiently with the blood god
记载了诸多巫祝的血腥手段，是有效的杀敌手段亦是可怕的诅咒。修行者如在深渊边上行走，时刻聆听血神呓语，若不能自控必将随之堕入深渊。=It is an effective means of killing the enemy and a terrible curse. Practitioners are like walking on the edge of the abyss, always listening to the murmurings of the blood god, and if they cannot control themselves, they will fall into the abyss with it.
心法5阶巫祝血神1=Heart method 5 steps witch wish blood god 1
巫祝的高阶心法，在上古时代对血神千年的供奉，终于得一窥神迹。演绎深层次的化神-血神之舞以天地煞气、血气，凝聚血神真身，进入最高的化神-血神境界，毁天灭地、血腥无匹。=The high level heart method of the witch shaman, after a thousand years of worship to the Blood God in the ancient times, finally got a glimpse of the divine. Performing the deep level of God of Transformation - Blood God's Dance with heaven and earth's fury and blood energy, condensing the true body of the Blood God, entering the highest realm of God of Transformation - Blood God, destroying heaven and earth, bloody and matchless.
巫祝血神一派的至高心法，传闻是血神亲自用鲜血撰写，其自发而生的诅咒，已令无数人命丧黄泉=It is rumored that the Blood God himself wrote it in blood, and its spontaneous curse has killed countless people.

记载着「两仪阵」的书籍，太极生两仪，两仪为阴阳。=The book "Binary Formation" is recorded. Taiji gives birth to Binary, and the Binary are yin and yang.
三才阵法书=Three talents formation book
记载着「三才阵」的书籍，有天道焉，有人道焉，有地道焉。兼三才而两之，故六。六者非它也，三才之道也。=The book that records the "Three Talent Formation" has the Way of Heaven, the Way of Man, and the Way of Earth. It is a combination of three talents and two, so six. The six is not it, but also the way of the three talents.
四象阵法书=Four Elephants Formation Book
记载着「四象阵」的书籍，四象者——少阳、太阳、少阴、太阴。=The book "Four Elephant Formation" is recorded. The Four Elephants - Shaoyang, Sun, Shaoyin and Taiyin.
风吼阵法书=Wind Howl Formation Spellbook
记载着「风吼阵」的书籍，奥妙无穷、中藏玄妙。风吼阵中兵刃窝，暗藏玄妙布天罗。=The book of "Wind Roar Formation" is full of mysteries and hidden wonders. The wind roar formation is a nest of blades and hidden mysteries of the sky.
五行阵法书=Five Elements Formation Book
记载着「五行阵」的书籍，五行者，水曰润下，火曰炎上，木曰曲直，金曰从革，土爰稼穑。=The book of "five elements" is recorded. The five elements are: water is said to moisten the bottom, fire is said to inflame the top, wood is said to bend and straighten, gold is said to be from leather, and earth is loved for harvesting.
红水阵法书=Red water formation book
记载着「红水阵」的书籍，炉内阴阳真奥妙，炼成壬癸里边藏。饶君就是金刚体，遇水粘身顷刻亡。=The book "Red Water Formation" is written, the true mystery of yin and yang inside the furnace, refined into none-decay inside the hide. If you are a vajra body, you will die instantly when you encounter water.
烈焰阵法书=Flame formation book
燧人方有空中火，炼养丹砂炉内藏。坐守离宫为首领，红旛展动化空亡。记载着「烈焰阵」的书籍，=The flint man has a fire in the air, and refines and raises the sand in the furnace. The red pennant moves to transform the empty death. The book "Flaming Flame Formation" is recorded.
落魂阵法书=Falling Soul Formation Spellbook
记载着「落魂阵」的书籍，闭生门，开死户，中藏天地厉气，结聚而成。=The book "Falling Soul Formation" is written to close the door of life and open the door of death, which contains the harsh energy of heaven and earth and is formed by the formation.
红砂阵法书=Red sand formation book
记载着「红砂阵」的书籍，红砂一撮道无穷，八卦炉中玄妙功，包罗万象为一处，方知太初有鸿蒙。=The book "red sand formation", a handful of red sand infinite, eight trigrams in the furnace of the mysterious and subtle work, encompassing all things for a place, and only know the beginning of the universe.
金光阵法书=Golden Light Formation Book
记载着「金光阵」的书籍，宝镜非铜又非金，不向炉中火内寻。纵有天仙逢此阵，须臾形化更难禁。=The book "Golden Light Formation" is written, the mirror is not copper and not gold, not to the fire in the furnace to find. Even if there is a celestial immortal encounter this formation, the shape of a short time more difficult to prohibit.
寒冰阵法书=Cold formation book
记载着「寒冰阵」的书籍，玄功炼就号“寒冰‘’，一座刀山上下凝。若是人仙逢此阵，连皮带骨尽无凭。=Recorded "cold ice formation" books, Xuan Gong refining number "cold ice '', a knife mountain up and down condensed. If a human immortal encounter this formation, even the skin and bones all without evidence.
化血阵法书=Blood Transfiguration Formation Spellbook
记载着「化血阵」的书籍，狂风卷起黑砂飞，天地无光动杀威。任你仙人闻此气，涓涓血水溅征衣。=The book "Blood Formation" is written, the wind rolls up the black sand flies, and the heaven and earth have no light to move the killing power. No matter how the immortals hear this gas, a trickle of blood splashes the clothes.
天绝阵法书=Heavenly Jedi Formation Book
记载着「天绝阵」的书籍，玄机妙算、奥妙无穷。天地人才颠倒推，玄中妙算多是非。神仙踏上不归路，凡人入阵化成灰。=The book that records the "Heavenly Extinction Formation" is full of mysteries and mysterious calculations. The talents of heaven and earth are pushed upside down, and there are many rights and wrongs in the mysterious calculation. The immortals set foot on the road of no return, mortals into the formation into ashes.

门派内:炼丹要素=Martial arts: alchemy element
药引\n放置于药引位置的材料，在炼丹过程中将会得到三倍的五行属性增幅\n\n火力值\n主要由火焰提供的参数，当火力值满足丹药的火力总值要求时，炼丹完成\n（炼丹所需回合\=火力值/火力总值）\n\n成丹值\n主要由丹炉提供的参数，决定炼制完成时候可获得的丹药数量\n\n额外融合度\n由炼制材料的五行属性比例决定\n越是相性合适的材料，炼制出来的丹药融合度越高，融合度决定丹药的品质=The materials placed in the medicine attraction will get three times the five -element attribute increase during the alchemy process\nThe fire value is mainly provided by the flames. When the fire value meets the total value of the firepower of the elixir, the alchemy is completed (the round required for alchemy \= fire value/total firepower)\nCheng Dan value is mainly a parameter provided by the Dan furnace.\nThe additional integration is determined by the five elements of the material of the material, the more the material is appropriate.

战斗机制:持续吟唱=Combat Mechanics:Continuous Chanting
持续吟唱法诀能调动更多的灵力注入招式中，进而造成异常强大的效果。\n\n但在瞬息万变的战场，此举无疑会暴露更多的破绽\n  -持续吟唱会被控制技能（眩晕、位移、沉默等）打断\n  -在吟唱完毕前离开受影响范围\n\n把握时机，控制敌人是躲避对手吟唱技能与自己吟唱技能命中的关键=Continuously chanting a spell can mobilize more spiritual energy into a move, which in turn can have a very powerful effect.\n\nHowever, in a fast-changing battlefield, this will undoubtedly expose more vulnerabilities - Continuous chanting can be interrupted by control skills (stun, displacement, silence, etc.) - Get out of the affected area before the chant is finished\n\nTiming and controlling the enemy is the key to avoiding the opponent's chanting skills and your own chanting skill hits
